Charming Studio in Boston Brownstone, #6.title: Charming Studio in Boston Brownstone, #6
Charming Studio in Boston Brownstone, #6.description:
The unit is stylishly designed for comfort, value and convenience. Centrally located on the line between Boston’s Back Bay and South End Neighborhoods. 

When you think of Boston, your first thought may not be the South End, but maybe it should be! Everywhere you turn there’s a boutique, bistro, or coffee shop, and the location of this studio is no different.  This studios's location boasts that neighborhood charm Boston is known for, with the location to access downtown with ease.The SpaceLocated on the 3rd floor; this unit is fully furnished a double bed, couch, desk with chair and accessorized kitchenette. The studio's kitchenette comes equipped with a mini fridge, microwave, two plate stove top, toaster and coffee maker. Other features include:

Free Wireless Internet
Direct satellite TV
All stainless appliances
Maple flooring, cabinets
Charming exposed brick wall
Antique 3×6 tiling
Pedestal bathroom sink
Italian track & floor lighting
Rear street view

Please note: Air conditioning is active in the units from June 1 to October 1. During May, should unseasonable weather be present, a window unit can be installed upon request.Guest AccessEach studio includes all utilities, high-speed wireless internet, direct satellite TV; set of towels and linens are provided upon arrival, flatware, silverware and cooking utensils; coin-op Laundry on 1st floor of building.

The studio is cleaned between each stay. However, longer term guests may bring any cleaning supplies and trash bags they wish to use. 
Coffee filters for the coffeepot. 4 cup Mr Coffee maker. 
Any additional toiletries you may need during your stay.Getting AroundSince Boston is widely known as a “walkable city” we recommend walking to your destinations or using our public transportation system “The T”. If you are interested in using Boston’s bike sharing system, Hubway, there are stations located up and down Newbury Street, with the closest location on Darmouth Street (5 minute walk). If you are looking for a car service, we recommend downloading the Uber or Lyft app. 

10 minute walk to Massachusetts Ave T Station – Orange Line
10 minute walk to Prudential Center
11 minute walk to Boston Public Library
13 minute walk to Symphony T Station – Green Line  
13 minute walk to Boston Symphony Hall
13 minute walk to Newbury Street
14 minute walk to Boston Public Garden

Luxury 3 Bedroom, 20 min to Boston, 15m.title: Luxury 3 Bedroom,  20 min to Boston, 15min Encore
Luxury 3 Bedroom, 20 min to Boston, 15m.description:
Traveling to Boston or the surrounding area? Stay with Maverick! We're a professional short-term rental management company with over 10,000 Reviews  and an average rating of 4.6 Stars. 

This BRAND NEW 3-bedroom apartment is located in Malden, MA - just 20 minutes from Boston, 15 minutes from Encore Casino, and 25 minutes to Salem.The SpaceThe apartment is located in the Basement level of the property and has it's own entrance. This stunning 3-bedroom featuring 3 separate rooms with queen beds. The apartment features a large living room, two spacious bathrooms with European style granite showers, and modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and granite counter tops.Guest AccessThis apartment has a private entrance located to the right of the main door of the building.InteractionFeel safe and secure at your convenience! Maverick Suites uses a self check-in process using smart lock systems. Your smart lock codes and check in instructions will arrive to your inbox 24 hours before your check in date. If you experience any issues or need assistance during your check in, our concierge team is available for calls and replies online, however Maverick Suites does not employ 24hr staff on site. After hours calls are directed to an emergency answering service.Other things to note*All requests for early check-in / late check-out are subject to availability. Any granted request has a $25 associated fee and cannot be determined more than 48hours in advance. Any unauthorized late checkout will automatically be subject to a $25 penalty.*

Here are some suggested “check-list” items to bring with you or to purchase shortly after you arrive:

Coffee and coffee filters (4-cup size)
Trash bags
Paper products for the apartment – additional paper towels, napkins, etc. Toilet paper will be replenished as needed during your stay
Cooking materials - Spices, condiments, oils, ingredients. We provide basic utensils.
Additional toiletries – We provide travel size soap, shampoo and conditioner upon check-in. However, we recommend bringing your own as well.
Detergent and dryer sheets; dishwasher pods

Please note parking lot next to and behind the building is NOT ours and belongs to the business next door and they will tow unauthorized vechiles. There is plenty of street parking around the building for you to use.

During Snow emergencies, parking on the main street is not permissable. We suggest parking on a side street and checking the signage. There are also lots designated by the city:
https://www.cityofmalden.org/609/Snow-Emergency-Parking-Locations

Cooking materials - Spices, condiments, oils, ingredients. We provide basic utensils.
Additional toiletries – We provide travel size soap, shampoo and conditioner upon check-in. However, we recommend bringing your own as well.
Detergent and dryer sheets; dishwasher pods

Please note parking lot next to and behind the building is NOT ours and belongs to the business next door and they will tow unauthorized vechiles. There is plenty of street parking around the building for you to use.

During Snow emergencies, parking on the main street is not permissable. We suggest parking on a side street and checking the signage. There are also lots designated by the city:
https://www.cityofmalden.org/609/Snow-Emergency-Parking-Locations

Luxury 1BR w/Gym, Steps From Commuter Ra.title: Luxury 1BR w/Gym, Steps From Commuter Rail #4011
Luxury 1BR w/Gym, Steps From Commuter Ra.description:
Welcome to The Met in Reading, MA - now offering exclusive, beautiful and newly furnished 1 Bedroom Apartments by Maverick Suites. Featuring all the comforts of home with a full kitchen, stylish living room, a Queen sized bed, spacious full bathroom and in-unit laundry. No need to worry about parking as this unit also comes with a designated parking spot in garage steps from the building.The SpaceBefore stepping into this gorgeous building, you will be required to enter a code given by Maverick Suites to gain access. This ensures safety for all of our guests and the other residents in the building! Once in the building, you will find a communal office/work space with free wifi provided, a complimentary coffee station, as well as a gym area. On the third and fourth floors you will find communal common spaces, which include a mini kitchenette, lounge area with a TV, as well as a pool table. 

Inside the apartment you will find a full kitchen, fully stocked with all the kitchen utensils to prepare and eat almost any meal! Next, a living room with a comfortable couch for family/friends to gather and use games (supplied), watch TV (smart tv) or just simply enjoy time together comfortably! Tucked around the corner is a dreamy bedroom, which holds a 12” memory foam queen mattress, stylish furniture to match and a spacious closet with hangers, extra blankets, an iron and ironing board inside. Lastly, you will find a washer and dryer and a spacious full bathroom.NeighborhoodLocated in the popular downtown Reading, MA area, you will feel right at home in this welcoming atmosphere! The property is located right across the street from the Reading Commuter Rail Stop on the Haverhill Line. However, if you prefer to drive during your trip, the property is located minutes from both I-95 and I-93. The neighborhood is full of great restaurants, coffee shops, salons and much more!InteractionFeel safe and secure at your convenience! Maverick Suites uses a self check-in process using smart lock systems. Your smart lock codes and check in instructions will arrive to your inbox 24 hours before your check in date. If you experience any issues or need assistance during your check in, our concierge team is available for calls and replies online from 10am-8pm; we have emergency line available for messages after hours. Maverick Suites does not employ 24hr staff on site.Other things to note*All requests for early check-in / late check-out are subject to availability. Any granted request has a $25 associated fee and cannot be determined more than 48hours in advance. Any unauthorized late checkout will automatically be subject to a $25 penalty.*

This property is NON SMOKING. Any guest found to be smoking in their apartment will be subject to immediate cancellation of their reservation and a $250 fee. 

Pets are allowed with an accompanying fee (based on length of stay) and a $250 security deposit. The building is pet friendly however, we do ask that pets are well behaved and the guests are mindful of this. The building host many permanent residents and we wish to remain cordial at all times.Getting AroundEach reservation comes with 1 garage spot for parking. The commuter rail Haverhill Line is located directly across the street. The property is walking distance to the downtown area of Reading, MA. I-95 and I-93 are only a few minutes down the street from the property.

Newly Renovated 3BR Country Ski House.title: Newly Renovated 3BR Country Ski House
Newly Renovated 3BR Country Ski House.description:
Our newly renovated 3BR modern farmhouse boasts a welcoming experience for intimate gatherings. Whether it’s a relaxing day at Conway lake (.5mi), discovering new hiking adventures, a lazy trip down Saco river, a shopping excursion in North Conway or skiing the white mountains, our centrally located, fully furnished farmhouse is ready to host you and your guests when visiting the Mt. Washington Valley.The SpaceA newly renovated Victorian farmhouse house from the early 1900's. Our spacious 3 bedroom & 1 bath home sits on a flat, one-acre lot & boasts a classic wrap-around porch. This modern farmhouse has original reclaimed hardwood floors throughout the majority of the house. The newly designed open layout provides a modern living experience w/ a timeless country charm.
The newly renovated fully stocked kitchen features new stainless steel appliances, Quartz countertops, wall-to-wall subway tiles, and natural live-edge shelves made from local maple trees. 
The bathroom has been fully renovated in late 2023, now boasting a beautiful stand-up shower with elegant stone flooring. 
The living & dining room can comfortably accommodate 5-6 guests and offers a smart TV w/ access to Netflix, books, and games for all ages.
The three upstairs bedrooms are modernly styled and feature 2 Queen & 1 King sized beds w/ quality memory foam mattresses. We provide all linens, bedding & pillows for your stay.NeighborhoodCoffee Shops & Breakfast Joints:
- Good Vibes Coffee Roasters (6 mins)
- Aroma Joe's Coffee (9 mins)
- The Met at Settler's Green (9 mins)
- Sweet Maple Cafe (8 mins)
- Fair Grounds Coffee (8 mins)
- Dunkin & Starbucks
Diana's Bath - 17 mins
Settler's Green Outlet, Grocery Stores, Restaurants, etc. - 9 mins
Saco River Canoe Rentals - 9 mins
Storyland - 21 mins
Conway Lake - 1 minute
Walks & Hikes: 
Black Cap Mountain Trailhead (Intermediate)
Echo Lake Trail (Beginner)
South Moat Mountain Trailhead (Intermediate-Hard)
ESI River Walk Trail (Beginner, nice walk)
Redstone Quarry (Beginner, nice walk)InteractionWe'll always be available via the AirBNB app and by text message. If there's ever any sort of an emergency, we can be reached by phone through our managing partner, Maverick Suites.

If you're new to the area or a veteran looking for something new to do, please don't hesitate to ask. We’d be more than happy to make suggestions & recommendations.Other things to noteOur property is in a quiet residential area. We ask that all guests are respectful of our neighbors and keep noise to a minimum. We have wonderful relationships with the families around us and we want nothing more than to continue to host tourists and adventurers like yourself. 

Fire Pit:
New Hampshire requires a fire permit for outdoor fires. To avoid a visit from the Center Conway police station and a fine, please visit the link below to acquire a permit. 
https://nh.burnsafeamerica.com/Customer

Wood Stove:
For safety reasons, we are requesting that our guests refrain from using the indoor wood stove.
amenities: Path to entrance lit at night

Modern & Cozy Getaway House near Conway.title: Modern & Cozy Getaway House near Conway lake - Pet Friendly
Modern & Cozy Getaway House near Conway.description:
Our newly renovated 1BR modern house is the perfect, cozy getaway for a pair (and their furry friend) looking for outdoor adventure, an intimate weekend in, or a combination of the two. Enjoy a day at Conway lake (.5mi), embark on a handful of hiking and ski adventures for all experience levels, a cruise down Saco River, or indulge local restaurants and a shopping spree just 9 minutes away in North Conway. Let our dog-friendly ski house be your home-away-from home. Take your skis off and relax in our fully furnished Conway getaway the next time you plan a stay in Mt. Washington Valley.The SpaceA newly renovated cozy ski house perfect for two. Our 1 bedroom & 1 bath home sits on a flat, one-acre lot on a quiet residential street. This spacious and modern home has brand new hardwood floors throughout the house. With natural wood elements in each room and design that exudes a comfy, modern feel, we hope our guests feel that this space is a warm welcome to their next New Hampshire adventure. 
We have a fully-stoked kitchen to make cooking easy and enjoyable.
The open layout living & dining area is ready for your home-cooked meals, hours of binging your favorite shows on our smart TV w/ access to Netflix, or comfortable seat to set up one of our available board games to bring out your competitive side. There is a Rennai heater in the living room that heats the entire home and provide an extra space-heater if needed.
The bedroom is styled with a country-modern feel and features a Queen sized bed with a quality memory foam mattress. We provide all linens, bedding & pillows for your stay.Guest AccessThere is a keypad on the door guests will be sent a personal code to the day before arrival to make check-in easy.
amenities: Flat smooth pathway to front door
Path to entrance lit at night

Comfortable Apartment w/Pool Gym & other.title: Comfortable Apartment w/Pool Gym & other Amenities
Comfortable Apartment w/Pool Gym & other.description:
Our stylish & comfortable stay is conveniently located near everything needed for an extended visit to the Metro Boston area. This fully furnished, pet-friendly, one-bedroom features the comforts of home with a full kitchen, living room, a queen bed, full bathroom, & in-unit laundry.
PLEASE NOTE: Due to the community policies at Washington Crossing Apartments, all Guests must undergo a quick criminal background check prior stay at our Woburn location.The SpaceThis Large, bright 1BR unit is located on the third floor with elevator access. You enter into a sizable, fully furnished kitchen with ample space and high ceilings. The large living room welcomes you for an evening of relaxation. Rather you're in town for a couple of weeks or working remotely for a time, and our comfortable apartment will be your home away from home. Enjoy the convenience of your own private wash & dryer in the suite. Bathroom fully laid out with shower and tub. Relax in our spacious and sunny bedroom with a Queen bed, full-length mirror, closet, and dresser for enough space for all your items. Complete with strong wifi and smart tv for logging into your own streaming account - this apartment is a dream.

Additionally, this apartment boasts a large array of community amenities for our guests to enjoy at no extra cost. We do allow pets upon request for a small monthly pet fee and refundable Security Deposit.Guest AccessGuests will have full access to all amenities of the property, including a shared guest lounge, fitness area, movie theater, business meeting room, work-from-home spaces, and an outdoor pool and grill area.

The apartment is one of Woburn MA's premier residential communities, and is surrounded by hundreds of shopping options, dozens of restaurants, gyms, and other convenient shops to enhance your stay. In addition, we're just minutes from both interstate 95 and 93.NeighborhoodWe are centrally located in Woburn and just a quick jump to Rt 95, 93, 128, and into Boston. Assigned Parking is free at the property and situated conveniently near your unit. The nearest commuter rail is the Mishawum station is located 6 minutes from the property. Just minutes from Woburn Village, the area's premier lifestyle shopping center.InteractionMaverick Suites does not employee 24hr staff on site but our team is always availableOther things to notePLEASE NOTE: Due to the community policies at Washington Grossing Apartments, all Guests must undergo a quick criminal background check prior stay at our Woburn location. This will be done after booking your reservation.Getting AroundWe are centrally located in Woburn and just a quick jump to Rt 95, 93, 128, and into Boston. 

By Car:
I-95 - 8 minutes 
I-93 - 3 minutes 
Boston - 20 minutes 
Mishawum Commuter Rail - 6 minutes (Train to Boston)
Middlesex Fells Reservation - 7 minutes.

Stylish Apartment in Malden, 20 Min from.title: Stylish Apartment in Malden, 20 Min from Boston #2
Stylish Apartment in Malden, 20 Min from.description:
Our comfortable apartment is centrally located in the city of Malden. The air-conditioned private apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, a kitchen with stainless steel appliances (including a dishwasher, gas stove & microwave ). The Living room has a flat-screen TV, a seating and dining area. We offer a coin operated washer & dryer on premise along with high speed wifi.  Making this the perfect apartment for a short or extended stay.The SpacePlease note, the sofa is NOT a pull-out bed.

This private apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, a kitchen with stainless steel appliances (including a dishwasher, gas stove & microwave ). The Living room has a flat-screen TV, a seating and dining area. We offer a coin operated washer & dryer on premise along with high speed wifi.Guest AccessGuests has the full apartment. Coin operated Laundry is on premise and for use of all tenants.Other things to noteHere are some suggested “check-list” items to bring with you or to purchase shortly after you arrive:

Coffee and coffee filters (4-cup size)
Trash bags
Paper products for the apartment – additional paper towels, napkins, etc. Toilet paper will be replenished as needed during your stay
Cooking materials - Spices, condiments, oils, ingredients. We provide basic utensils.
Additional toiletries – We provide travel size soap, shampoo and conditioner upon check-in. However, we recommend bringing your own as well.
Detergent and dryer sheets; dishwasher pods

Please note parking lot next to and behind the building is NOT ours and belongs to the business next door and they will tow unauthorized vechiles. There is plenty of street parking around the building for you to use.

During Snow emergencies, parking on the main street is not permissable. We suggest parking on a side street and checking the signage.

1BR Luxury Apartment Peabody - Unit #606.title: 1BR Luxury Apartment Peabody - Unit #606
1BR Luxury Apartment Peabody - Unit #606.description:
Escape to our modern, elegant 1-bedroom apartment located on Hotel Ave in Peabody, MA. This luxurious haven offers the perfect blend of style and comfort. A fully-equipped kitchen with brand new appliances and marble countertops awaits. The apartment features in-unit laundry and chic, contemporary furnishings throughout. As a high-floor unit, you’ll have unobstructed views from the large windows, providing a serene and peaceful retreat from the city. Located at the intersection of two major highways, Route 1 and 95, it provides easy access to transportation for commuting and exploring the surroundings. Conveniently located near restaurants, bars, and shops, this apartment is the ideal base for experiencing all that the North Shore and Boston have to offer. Book your stay today and discover the perfect blend of luxury, convenience, and comfort in our modern 1-bedroom apartment.The SpaceIndulge in the luxurious comfort of this modern 1-bedroom apartment. With an open floor plan and plenty of natural light, the space is designed to create a relaxing and inviting atmosphere. The apartment is located near the floor of an 8-story building, providing unobstructed views of the surrounding area. The bedroom features a comfortable queen-size bed with plush linens and ample closet space. The living area is furnished with a stylish sofa and armchair, perfect for relaxing after a day of exploring. Our fully-equipped kitchen boasts brand new appliances and marble countertops, making it easy to whip up a delicious meal at “home”. The apartment also features in-unit laundry for your convenience. With stylish and contemporary furnishings throughout, our apartment is the ultimate getaway with tranquility and style.Guest AccessAs our guest, you will have exclusive access to the entire apartment during your reservation. You can take advantage of the apartment's many amenities, including the fully-equipped kitchen, in-unit laundry, and comfortable living area. In addition, you will have access to the building's private garage parking on the first floor, ensuring that your vehicle stays safe and secure. The building is also equipped with a secure entry system, providing peace of mind throughout your stay.NeighborhoodOur apartment is located in the heart of the North Shore region of Massachusetts surrounded by towns like Salem, Danvers, and Beverly. You'll have easy access to attractions like the Peabody Essex Museum, Witch Trials Memorial, and local beaches and parks.

Shopping and dining options are plentiful, with the Northshore Mall nearby offering high-end retailers and restaurants, and local restaurants and shops scattered throughout the area. Outdoor enthusiasts will appreciate the nearby Brooksby Farm and Lynn Woods Reservation. The apartment's central location at the intersection of Route 1 and 95 allows for easy exploration of the surrounding areas.InteractionOur concierge team is available for calls and replies online, however Maverick Suites does not employ 24hr staff on site. After hours calls are directed to an emergency answering service.Other things to note*All requests for early check-in / late check-out are subject to availability. Any granted request has a $25 associated fee and cannot be determined more than 24 Hours in advance. Any unauthorized late checkout will automatically be subject to a $25 penalty .

*We provide complimentary toilet paper, travel size shampoo, conditioner, soap and a hair dryer. Linens and towels are provided. Guests should bring any cooking materials, paper products, coffee filters, and additional toiletries they may need during their stay. The apartment is cleaned between each reservation and can be cleaned during your stay for an additional charge.Getting AroundOur apartment's location at the intersection of Route 1 and 95 provides easy access to transportation, whether you're commuting to Boston or exploring the North Shore region.

The closest train station is in Salem, just a 10-minute drive away, with trains running regularly to Boston's North Station. If you prefer to drive, you can easily access Route 1, which will take you directly into the city in around 20 minutes.

There are also several bus routes that pass through the area, offering another convenient option for getting around. For those with their own vehicles, private, garage parking is assigned and located on the first floor of the building.

The bedroom features a comfortable queen-size bed with plush linens, and the living area is furnished with a stylish sofa and armchair, perfect for relaxing after a day of exploring. Our fully-equipped kitchen boasts brand new appliances and marble countertops, making it easy to whip up a delicious meal at home. The apartment also features in-unit laundry for your convenience. With chic, contemporary furnishings throughout, our apartment is the ultimate oasis of tranquility and style.Guest AccessAs our guest, you will have exclusive access to the entire apartment during your stay. You can take advantage of the apartment's many amenities, including the fully-equipped kitchen, in-unit laundry, and comfortable living area. In addition, you will have access to the building's private garage parking on the first floor, ensuring that your vehicle stays safe and secure throughout your stay. The building is also equipped with a secure entry system, providing peace of mind during your stay.NeighborhoodOur apartment is located in the heart of the North Shore region of Massachusetts surrounded by towns like Salem, Danvers, and Beverly. You'll have easy access to attractions like the Peabody Essex Museum, Witch Trials Memorial, and local beaches and parks.

Shopping and dining options are plentiful, with the Northshore Mall nearby offering high-end retailers and restaurants, and local restaurants and shops scattered throughout the area. Outdoor enthusiasts will appreciate the nearby Brooksby Farm and Lynn Woods Reservation. The apartment's central location at the intersection of Route 1 and 95 allows for easy exploration of the surrounding areas.InteractionOur concierge team is available for calls and replies online, however Maverick Suites does not employ 24hr staff on site. After hours calls are directed to an emergency answering service.Other things to note*All requests for early check-in / late check-out are subject to availability. Any granted request has a $25 associated fee and cannot be determined more than 24 Hours in advance. Any unauthorized late checkout will automatically be subject to a $25 penalty .

*We provide complimentary toilet paper, travel size shampoo, conditioner, soap and a hair dryer. Linens and towels are provided. Guests should bring any cooking materials, paper products, coffee filters, and additional toiletries they may need during their stay. The apartment is cleaned between each reservation and can be cleaned during your stay for an additional charge.Getting AroundOur apartment's location at the intersection of Route 1 and 95 provides easy access to transportation, whether you're commuting to Boston or exploring the North Shore region.

The closest train station is in Salem, just a 10-minute drive away, with trains running regularly to Boston's North Station. If you prefer to drive, you can easily access Route 1, which will take you directly into the city in around 20 minutes.

There are also several bus routes that pass through the area, offering another convenient option for getting around. For those with their own vehicles, private, garage parking is available on the first floor of our building.

Modern Luxury 1BR on Lynn Saugus line.title: Modern Luxury 1BR on Lynn Saugus line
Modern Luxury 1BR on Lynn Saugus line.description:
Experience the best of New England with a stay in our luxury 1-bedroom apartment in Lynn, MA - just 20 minutes from downtown Boston. Our modernly styled unit features a brand-new kitchen with quartz countertops, in-unit laundry, beautiful treetop views, an elevator and is pet friendly.

PLEASE NOTE: Due to the community policies at Ironwood Apartments, all Guests must undergo a quick criminal background check prior stay at our Lynn location.The SpaceSituated within the Ironwood Apartments luxury community, our 700-square foot apartment is located on the fourth floor and conveniently accessible by elevator. Boasting hardwood floors, a fully-stocked kitchen with all the essentials, in-unit laundry and a 55-inch Smart TV with WiFi, this space offers all the comforts of home. Plus, the community amenities such as the fitness center and private off-street parking add to the convenience of your stay.Guest AccessIn addition to all the amenities within the apartment, guests have access to the community amenities such as: 

Two state of the art fitness centers with internet-enabled Precor equipment
Community lounge and co-working spaces
Outdoor ground level patio spaces with cooking and fireplace facilities**
Common area WiFi
3000 square foot rooftop terrace at Ironwood North with sweeping views, outdoor heaters, cooking facilities, lounge area, bar area, dining areas, and fireplace*
Off-street and secure garage parking options
Additional storage options*
State of the art pet-wash kiosk and outdoor dog park**
Secure bicycle storage and repair station
Package concierge lockers by ParcelPending
Safety features include 24/7 CCTV coverage, Kaba Saflok RFID**/LATCH* locks and Butterfly MX video entry systemNeighborhoodOur apartment is located in the peaceful West Lynn / Saugus Line neighborhood, nearby  supermarkets and shopping areas. Just 6 minutes from route 1 and 10 minutes from the route 1 and Interstate 95 intersection, you’ll have easy access to all the attractions the Northshore has to offer, or a quick commute into the city.Getting AroundParking available on premise.
amenities: Wide clearance to shower and toilet

Whether you're here for business or pleasure, Maverick Suites' 28 Fenway is the perfect place to experience life in Boston.Other things to note"*All requests for early check-in / late check-out are subject to availability. Any granted request has a $25 associated fee and cannot be determined more than 24 Hours in advance. Any unauthorized late checkout will automatically be subject to a $25 penalty .

*We provide complimentary toilet paper, travel size shampoo, conditioner, soap and a hair dryer. Linens and towels are provided. Coin-operated laundry is available in the building, and a linen turnover is available for a $25 fee. Guests should bring any cooking materials, paper products, coffee filters, and additional toiletries they may need during their stay. The studio is cleaned between each reservation and can be cleaned during your stay for an additional charge. "Getting AroundLocated in the heart of the Fenway neighborhood, you'll be in the perfect spot to explore the city's historic sights and attractions. With easy access to public transportation, you can get around the city with ease. The subway is just a short walk away, and the walkability of the neighborhood makes it easy to explore the nearby Prudential Center, Hynes Convention Center, Fenway Park, and the Back Bay neighborhood.

Luxury Apartment w/ Office & Gym.title: Luxury Apartment w/ Office & Gym
Luxury Apartment w/ Office & Gym.description:
Welcome to our chic modern apartment on Hotel Ave in Peabody, MA. Enjoy versatile living with the option to use it as a 2-bedroom. The apartment features a fully-equipped kitchen, in-unit laundry, and contemporary furnishings. With two bathrooms, it offers added convenience. Located at the crossroads of Route 1 and 95, it offers easy access to the area's attractions and amenities. Plus, the building boasts a common area lounge and gym. Book today for a blend of luxury and convenience.The SpaceDesigned with an open floor plan and thoughtfully placed windows, the space is flooded with natural light, creating an inviting ambiance. Situated on the 5th floor of an 8-story building, this apartment offers uninterrupted vistas of the surrounding area.

Flexibility is key - this apartment can function as a spacious one-bedroom with a home office or transform into a two-bedroom using the convenient pull-out couch in the office area. The bedroom is elegantly furnished with a queen-size bed dressed in plush linens and ample closet space.

The living area exudes style and comfort, featuring a sleek sofa and a dining table. Our fully-equipped kitchen boasts brand new appliances and elegant marble countertops, making it a breeze to prepare delicious meals right at 'home.' For added convenience, the apartment is equipped with in-unit laundry facilitiesGuest AccessDuring your stay, you'll have complete access to the entire apartment, allowing you to fully enjoy its array of amenities. These include a well-equipped kitchen, convenient in-unit laundry facilities, and a comfortable living area thoughtfully designed for your relaxation.

Furthermore, your reservation includes complimentary access to the building's private garage parking on the first floor, providing both convenience and security for your vehicle. As an added bonus, you'll have exclusive entry to the building's gym and communal lounge area, offering extra spaces to unwind and rejuvenate throughout your stay."Neighborhood"Our apartment is located in the heart of the North Shore region of Massachusetts surrounded by towns like Salem, Danvers, and Beverly. You'll have easy access to attractions like the Peabody Essex Museum, Witch Trials Memorial, and local beaches and parks.

Shopping and dining options are plentiful, with the Northshore Mall nearby offering high-end retailers and restaurants, and local restaurants and shops scattered throughout the area. Outdoor enthusiasts will appreciate the nearby Brooksby Farm and Lynn Woods Reservation. The apartment's central location at the intersection of Route 1 and 95 allows for easy exploration of the surrounding areas."Getting AroundOur apartment's location at the intersection of Route 1 and 95 provides easy access to transportation, whether you're commuting to Boston or exploring the North Shore region.

The closest train station is in Salem, just a 10-minute drive away, with trains running regularly to Boston's North Station. If you prefer to drive, you can easily access Route 1, which will take you directly into the city in around 20 minutes.

There are also several bus routes that pass through the area, offering another convenient option for getting around. For those with their own vehicles, private, garage parking is assigned and located on the first floor of the building

The Bartlum | Luxury Studio In Prime Loc.title: The Bartlum | Luxury Studio In Prime Location!
The Bartlum | Luxury Studio In Prime Loc.description:
Welcome to the Bartlum, a historic and luxurious studio apartment just steps to Duval Street. 

This studio, located on Caroline St, has been designed with comfort in mind, offering large windows for natural sunlight and plenty of space to spread out. Enjoy an updated kitchen, spacious bathroom, open concept layout, and all the hot spots of Key west within walking distance!The SpaceThis studio apartment is attached to a grand historic conch home and enjoys private access through a street-front courtyard. Enjoy the updated "chef's" kitchen with stainless-steel appliances that’s fully stocked with everything you need! Sip coffee in the morning from your Keurig coffee maker and take in the fresh Florida air in the outdoor seating area.

Have an extra guest or 2? No worries! The queen sized pull out sleeper sofa allows for comfortable sleeping for 2 and, allowing for a total of 4 occupants in the unit as a whole.Guest AccessOur contactless check-in procedure makes check-in easy. Guest will receive a personalized access code prior to arrival.NeighborhoodPlaced perfectly in-between Downtown and the Historic seaport, enjoy attractions like Mallory Square at sunset, Brightwild Adventures for a day out at the sandbar, Dante's Pool Bar and the Shipwreck and Mel Fisher Maritime Museum for some Key West History.

Half a block from Duval Street, The Bartlum, is steps away from Key Wests most famous bars and kitchens. Local’s favorite restaurants such as Fat Tuesdays, Irish Kevin's, Sloppy Joe's, Bagatelle and Two Friend’s patio are less than a 5 minute walk from your front door. Got a sweet tooth? Keep an eye out for Kermit’s Key Lime pie shop in the Historic Seaport known for the best Key Lime Pie in Key West, or grab some homemade fudge and candy from River Street Sweets.

Forgot something and or need a quick fix? Shorty’s Market has your last minute necessities for your weekend getaway. Just 2 blocks away you can also find Fausto’s food market for locally sourced groceries.Other things to noteFree WiFi
No pets allowed
No parking included
No smokingGetting AroundOne of the best parts of staying in Key West is how close in proximity you are to everything. Don’t feel like walking? Peddle your way to breakfast, or take a bike ride along the water at sunset. Rent your bikes from Fury or Island Bicycles who offer both pick up & drop off services to your home! Feel like you’re on island time when you rent from Minty’s where you can enjoy exploring Key West on a scooter or golf cart. In addition to these non-traditional modes of transportation, you can also Uber, Lyft or Taxi to your next destination. Pink Taxi is an easy, reliable and affordable way for getting to your rental from the airport.

Unfortunately, there is no on-site parking for this unit.
For overnight parking here are some parking lots:
• 204 Simonton Street (This is right around the corner from your unit and the most affordable on the island!)
• Caroline Street Outdoor Parking Lot
• Park N Ride Old Town Garage
Street parking information:
• Street parking varies, from metered spots to free spots to residential. Please note: do not park in any spots marked "residential" they are for Key West Residents only and you can get a ticket.

The Collins on Duval by Brightwild.title: The Collins on Duval by Brightwild
The Collins on Duval by Brightwild.description:
Located right in the heart of the World Famous Duval Street, enjoy a true downtown Key West experience! The Collins offers a central location to Key West’s main attractions and everything else the Southernmost city has to offer. With a balcony overlooking Duval Street you can be as much connected to or above the action as your whim desires.The SpaceThe downstairs bedroom features a king size bed, while the upstairs loft-style bedroom features 2 king size beds for ample sleeping space. There are also two pull out couches located in downstairs living room - allowing for up to 10 guests to reside here. 

This condo is fully equipped with a full kitchen, living room, dining area and balcony overlooking Duval Street. The kitchen contains a stove, refrigerator, and Keurig coffee machine. The bathroom has a full bathtub and shower. Enjoy central AC, smart TV's, ceiling fans and free wifi after a day on the town.Guest AccessOur contactless check-in procedure makes check-in easy. Guests will receive a personalized access code 3 days prior to check-in to enter the unit.

How to access: This property is a historic loft and can only be accessed by a flight of stairs. There is no elevator available.NeighborhoodOn the 500 block of Duval, The Collins is centralized to everything Key West. 
In the heart of Duval street you can find many of locals favorite's such as: Fausto's Food Market, Keys Coffee Co., and Cuban Coffee Queen, and tourist attractions such as: The Ernest Hemingway house, Mallory Square and Key West Lighthouse, all walking distance from your front door! 
Looking for a night out, find Willy T's, Fogarty's and Fat Tuesday's within 1 block.

Being in the heart of everything does come with noise of Duval street, but nonetheless an easy and convenient location to experience all Key West has to offer!Other things to note- Private stackable washer & dryer. 
- This unit is not pet friendly.Getting AroundParking Information: 
There is no on-site parking for this unit. We recommend dropping off belongings before parking overnight if you can not find street parking.
For overnight parking here are some parking lots:
• Fleming Street Pay-to-Park Lot (This is Closest to you!)
• 204 Simonton Street
• Caroline Street Outdoor Parking Lot
• Park N Ride Old Town Garage

Street parking information:
• There are pay-to-park spots and meters and it is free from 12AM - 8AM. With a 3 day limit.
• The neighborhoods of Old Town offer some free parking spaces, but be aware that many of the spots are marked “Residential Only” and visitors are NOT permitted to park in them.

There are a variety of great ways to explore Key West including by bicycle, scooter, golf cart, Uber, Taxi, or by feet. As this unit is located in downtown Key West, many attractions are within walking distance.
amenities: Path to entrance lit at night

Grand Marina Suite by Brightwild | Water.title: Grand Marina Suite by Brightwild | Waterfront
Grand Marina Suite by Brightwild | Water.description:
A beautiful oceanfront suite located at the best marina in the Keys. Situated on the glistening Atlantic Ocean, our Grand Marina Suite is a tranquil respite with on-site access to boat dockage and world-class fishing charters. Located minutes away from downtown Key West, known for its quaint boutiques, historic landmarks, sight-seeing, sunsets and dancing. Our condominium will provide you with an intimate lodging experience unlike any hotel.The SpaceGrand Marina Suite is a full two-bedroom suite, with a full kitchen, living room and outdoor lanai. Each of the two bedrooms feature luxurious king sized beds and en suite bathrooms. There is a sleeper sofa in the living room. Outside of the Suite, our guests are encouraged to take advantage of our on-site pool, beach, sauna and fitness center.Guest AccessOur contactless check-in procedure makes check-in easy. Guests will receive a personalized access code prior to arrival.NeighborhoodOur property is secluded and private yet minutes away from the excitement of Key West. This condo is located at the private Key West Harbour Marina, in Stock Island, the authentic and revitalized fishing and arts community located directly east of downtown Key West.Other things to note-For the purpose of creating a safe environment for our guests, the exterior of the building is monitored by security cameras.
-Please note the onsite restaurant is no longer open.
- Not pet friendlyGetting AroundArrive by boat, plane or car.  On-site golf cart rentals are available, or take advantage of the many taxi and ride-sharing services available for short trips around Key West.

There are assigned parking spots in front of the Harbour Residences marked as "Condo 1," "Condo 2," or "Condo 3." You have 2 private parking spots located in front of your unit included with your stay.
amenities: Flat smooth pathway to front door
Path to entrance lit at night

The Andros by Brightwild | 4th Floor Sun.description:
- Welcome to the quiet Sunrise Suites community located on the southeast side of Key West.
- Just 1 mile from the beach where aqua blue waters & loungers await. 
- Only a 10 minute ride to downtown Duval Street restaurants, attractions & nightlife. 
- The Great Exuma is a two bedroom two bathroom 4th floor condo with evening sunset views.
- Your stay includes access to all of your must-haves: shared hot tub, heated pool, walking paths, biking trails, tennis court & laundry facilities!The SpaceThe sleeping arrangements include one king bed in the master, one queen bed in the second bedroom, and one queen sofa bed - allowing for a maximum occupancy of 6. 

The unit has a private balcony with exquisite views of the salt marshes, along with central AC, cable, free WiFi, and a fully equipped kitchen.Guest AccessOur contactless check-in procedure makes check-in easy. Guests will receive a personalized access code 3 days prior to check-in to enter the unit.
Shared community features: The guests of this condominium are able to take advantage of the shared hot tub, shared pool, and tennis courts. 
How to access: This unit has both stairs and elevator access.NeighborhoodGreat Exuma Suite is located inside of the Sunrise Suites Resort Community located just minutes away from the World Famous Duval Street and its vibrant restaurants, art galleries and nightlife. Inside the community you can find a corner store, spa, walking and biking trails. It is also located just a short drive away from the nightly Sunset Celebration and entertainment at Mallory Square.Other things to note​​- There is a private stackable washer/dryer in unit
- This unit is located next to the airport.

•40lb maximum per pet

Duval Corner | Updated Condo, Steps to D.title: Duval Corner | Updated Condo, Steps to Duval St!
Duval Corner | Updated Condo, Steps to D.description:
Welcome to Duval Corner, a beautifully updated, modern 1BR condo located in Downtown Key West! This 2nd floor condo is perfect for the traveler who wants to walk to everything, because you can! Find yourself enjoying a variety of Key West attractions including the Southernmost Point, Ernest Hemingway Home, Mallory Square, and popular dining spots such as Blue Heaven, 7 Fish, Louie's Backyard and Martin's, all within walking distance.The SpaceDuval Corner is perfectly located right on corner of Duval St and Amelia St in downtown Key West. The bedroom offers vaulted ceilings, a ceiling fan, a comfy Queen sized bed, flat screen cable TV, closet, bedside lighting, and an en suite bathroom with fresh linens and toiletries.

The living room features a full length mirror, vaulted ceilings, huge flat screen TV with cable, bar seating, and a pull out Queen sleeper sofa. 

The newly renovated kitchen offers everything you need to cook up a meal during your stay, including a microwave, stove top, fridge, freezer, toaster, blender, and a Keurig coffee maker with complimentary coffee supplies. Enjoy the interior comforts of Duval Corner or head outside and chill out on the shared balcony with a drink in your hand.Guest AccessOur self check-in makes the process seamless. 

Guests will receive a personalized access code prior to arrival and direct contact to a local guest experience manager for any questions, needs or recommendations during their stay.

Looking for a night out? Check out nearby local favorite's like Mary Ellen's, Green Parrot Bar, and Virgilio's, or head down to the other end of Duval to popular spots like Irish Kevins, Sloppy Joe's, Rick's, and Hogsbreath Saloon.

Located at the "quieter" end of Duval St, "Duval Corner" is a stress-free and convenient spot to experience all Key West has to offer!Other things to note- This unit does not have a washer/dryer. Margaret-Truman Launderette 0.5 miles away has drop off and self service machines.

Andy's Attic by Brightwild | Budget-Frie.title: Andy's Attic by Brightwild | Budget-Friendly!
Andy's Attic by Brightwild | Budget-Frie.description:
Looking for a budget-friendly place to stay in during your Key West vacation? Look no further than Andy's Attic - a small, efficiency studio located at The Galleria Guesthouse in the heart of Bahama Village. 

The Galleria complex features a heated pool, sundeck, gas grill, bike racks, multiple balconies and a perfect location in a quiet neighborhood.The SpaceThe Galleria was once a haven for traveling artists who frequented Key West to find inspiration and show off their work in the nearby art galleries of Duval Street. With a tranquil pool area and spacious sundeck, The Galleria has now been transformed into an oasis for all travelers looking for relaxation and inspiration during their time in Key West.

This tiny, but well-equipped studio apartment is located on the second floor of the charming Galleria condo complex. The space is designed to cater to the needs of two guests who are looking for budget friendly options during their stay in paradise. The studio features a comfortable Queen size bed that will provide a restful sleep after a long day of exploring all the famous attractions that Key West has to offer. A convenient kitchenette  offers a Keurig coffee maker with complimentary coffee supplies, a microwave, toaster, and a mini fridge to store snacks and drinks. Enjoy free WiFi and cable TV, so you can stay connected with your friends and family and enjoy your favorite shows during your stay.Guest AccessOur contactless check-in procedure makes check-in easy. Guest will receive 2 unique access codes upon check-in. One code will be used to access the hallway, the second will be used to access the room.

Guests will have access to the heated pool, onsite laundry facility, bike rack, sundeck, and gas grill.

Parking: there is no onsite parking, but there is free street parking on a first come first serve basis.NeighborhoodBahama Village is a historic, mostly residential neighborhood just a few short blocks from the main strip of Duval Street. Visitors (and locals) love this area due to its beautiful, Bahamian-inspired atmosphere, as well as its close proximity to famous attractions and amazing food options. Walk, bike, or scooter down to the Southernmost Point, Key West Lighthouse, Butterfly Conservatory, Truman Waterfront Park, and the Earnest Hemingway Museum. Enjoy some of Key West's most popular restaurants such as Blue Heaven, Santiago's, Firefly, and Rams Head Southernmost.Other things to note- Please note that this unit is very small and may not be comfortable for some guests.
- There is a shared washer/dryer available on the first floor next to the pool area.
- Pets are welcome! Our requirements are as follows:
   - 40lb maximum per pet
   - $15/night per pet
   - 2 pet maximum

Please let us know if you plan on bringing your pet!Getting AroundParking Information: 

There is no on-site parking provided. Free street parking is available on a first-come first-service basis and located directly in front of the Galleria complex. There is no guaranteed availability or proximity to the unit. Should you find a parking spot, please note you can not park in one marked "Residential" and some spots may be pay-to-park on neighboring streets.

There are a variety of great ways to explore Key West including by bicycle, pedi-cab, moke, scooter, golf cart, Uber, Taxi, or by feet. As this unit is located in downtown Key West, many attractions are within walking distance. Feel free to ask us for recommendations!

Southern Palms by Brightwild | Pool & Pa.title: Southern Palms by Brightwild | Pool & Parking
Southern Palms by Brightwild | Pool & Pa.description:
Southern Palms is the perfect vacation rental for your large group! It is a property split into three separated rentals: Coconut Palm, Traveler's Palm and Royal Palm. These 3 properties can be booked individually or together as Southern Palms. Southern Palms has its own private pool, private hot tub, five bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, BBQ grill and a tropical backyard. The property is located on Whitehead St. just steps away from downtown Key West and the historic Duval St.The SpaceThe whole property allows for a maximum occupancy of 16, the bed layout is as follows:
Coconut Palm: 
Bedroom 1: Queen
Bedroom 2: King with attached living area & queen pullout couch
Bedroom 3: Queen with en suite bathroom

Traveler's Palm: 
Studio: 2 Kings & a queen pullout couch in the living room 

Royal Palm: 
Studio: King Bed

Coconut Palm has three bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and a spacious backyard with a BBQ grill. The bedrooms include 1 king, 2 queens, and a pullout couch attached to the king bedroom, sleeping up to 8 guests.

Traveler's Palm is a separate studio located upstairs from Coconut Palm. It has its own private entrance, a large balcony with a hammock and a kitchenette. This unit includes 2 king size beds and a pullout couch, sleeping up to 6 guests.

Royal Palm is located on the other side of the backyard. It is a cozy studio with its own patio, kitchenette and hot tub. This unit features a king size bed sleeping 2 guests.Guest AccessOur contactless check-in procedure makes check-in easy. Guests will receive a personalized access code prior to check-in to enter the unit.NeighborhoodLocated on Whitehead St which is 1 block from world famous Duval St, "Southern Palms" is walking distance to nearly  everything you will want to experience during your escape to Key West. Walk to popular spots like The Southernmost Point, Key West Lighthouse, Blue Heaven, Firefly, Green Parrot and the Ernest Hemingway Home which are all just right down the street. Want to hit the beach? Head down to Ft Zach State Park & Beach and enjoy the crystal clear waters and beautiful quiet beaches for a small admission fee.Other things to note- There are 2 washer/dryers on site: one located just off of the back deck and one in the driveway.
- New patio stools & cushions replaced April 2023
- Pets are welcome! Our requirements are as follows: 
•40lb maximum per pet
•$15/night per pet
•2 pet maximum
Please let us know if you plan on bringing your pet.
- If you are within 90 days of your check in date: you can reserve the compound properties individually (Coconut Palm, Travelers Palm & Royal Palm)
- New pullout couch replaced April 2023Getting AroundParking Information: If you reserve all three units in Southern Palms (including: Coconut Palm, Travelers Palm & Royal Palm), there is space for two compact cars in the gated driveway. Sea Breeze is the perfect location for your tropical getaway. This two bedroom condo is located in the heart of Old Town Key West, just steps away from the world famous Duval Street's shops, bars and restaurants! With off-street parking and just one block from Duval, this property has everything you need and more.The SpaceThis quaint two bedroom condominium has two queen beds and one queen sofa bed allowing for a maximum occupancy of six.

Walk to popular spots like The Southernmost Point, Key West Lighthouse, Blue Heaven, Firefly, Green Parrot and the Earnest Hemingway Home which are all just right down the street. Want to hit the beach? Head down to Ft Zach State Park & Beach and enjoy the crystal clear waters and beautiful quiet beaches for a small admission fee.Other things to note- Property includes onsite washer/dryer (located in the outside closet).

The Salt Cay by Brightwild | Sunset View.description:
- Welcome to the quiet Sunrise Suites community located on the southeast side of Key West.
- Just 1 mile from the beach where aqua blue waters & loungers await. 
- Only a 10 minute drive to downtown Duval Street restaurants, attractions & nightlife. 
- Two bedroom bright & airy condo with free parking & private balcony!
- Your stay includes access to all of your must-haves: shared hot tub, heated amazing pool, walking paths, biking trails, tennis court & laundry facilities!The SpaceThis recently renovated unit comes fully equipped with new marble countertops, new living room chairs and couches, a flat screen TV and a large private balcony. There is Free Wifi and cable provided as well as a fully equipped kitchen including a dishwasher, fridge, microwave and stove. The guests of this condominium are able to take advantage of the shared hot tub, private washer and dryer, shared pool, and tennis courts.Guest AccessOur contactless check-in procedure makes check-in easy.  The guests of this condominium are able to take advantage of the shared hot tub, shared washer and dryer, shared pool, and tennis courts. Inside the community you can find a corner store, spa, walking and biking trails.  It is also located just a short drive away from the nightly Sunset Celebration and entertainment at Mallory Square.Other things to noteFree onsite parking is included with your stay.
Private washer/dryer located in unit.
This unit is located close to the airport. 
Pets are welcome!
Our requirements are as follows: 
•40lb maximum per pet
•$15/night per pet
•2 pet maximum
Please let us know if you plan on bringing your pet.Getting AroundOne of the best parts of staying in Key West is how close in proximity you are to everything, this small little 2x4 island offers a variety of ways to get to and from your destination! Don’t feel like walking? Peddle your way to breakfast, or take a bike ride along the water at sunset, by renting from Fury or Island Bicycles who offer both pick up & drop off of bike services! Feel like you’re on island time when you rent from Minty’s where you can enjoy exploring Key West on a scooter or golf cart! In addition to these non-traditional modes of transportation, you can also Uber, Lyft or Taxi to your next destination. Pink Taxi is an easy, reliable and affordable way for getting to your rental from the airport.

There is 1 parking spot available per apartment. However, the spots are not marked. They are available on a first-come first-serve basis so we can not guarantee close proximity to your unit.

Coastal Condo 607 by Brightwild | Beachf.title: Coastal Condo 607 by Brightwild | Beachfront!
Coastal Condo 607 by Brightwild | Beachf.description:
This beachfront ocean-view condominium is perfect for your getaway to Panama City Beach! Recently renovated and located on the sixth floor, this condo boasts new stainless steel appliances, stylish coastal decor, a private washer and dryer, two spacious bathrooms, and enough sleeping room for six people. Enjoy beautiful sunsets from the large balcony with amazing views off the living room and master bedroom. Sunrise Beach Resort is one of the newest condominium complexes in Panama City Beach.The SpaceThe luxury Gulf-facing master bedroom has a King-size bed with balcony access and a full bathroom, including a garden tub and separate shower. The second bedroom room has a twin over full-size bunk bed. The hall bathroom has a bathtub and shower. The living room has a queen-sized sofa bed. View the white sand beach and emerald green water from the living room and master bedroom. 

The kitchen is fully equipped with appliances and plates, glasses, and cutlery. The living room, master bedroom, and bunk room all have a TV and high-speed internet access is provided at no extra charge.Guest AccessOur contactless check-in procedure makes check-in easy. Guests will receive a personalized access code before check-in to enter the unit.

Shared Community Features: The resort features two large swimming pools (one is heated seasonally), a children's splash area, two hot tubs, and complimentary beach service (March-October). It also offers a first-rate workout facility complete with treadmills, cardio machines, and extensive free weights, all overlooking the Gulf of Mexico. Gas grills are available at the beach-level deck.NeighborhoodSunrise Beach Resort is a conveniently located condo resort that sits right on the beach in Panama City Beach. The resort is close to many popular attractions such as Gulf World Marine Park, Pier Park, Frank Brown Park, Goofy Golf, and Shipwreck Island Water Park.Other things to note- This property has a 3-night minimum Feb - April, all other dates are 1-night minimum
- No pets allowed. 
- We do not allow smoking inside this property. All reservations are subject to being charged a smoking fee if you or your guests choose to smoke inside.
- The door locks automatically behind you.
- 2 Beach Chairs and an umbrella are included with your stay (March-October)
- Ice machine is available on level 1 
- 2 Grills are available on the first floor
- The gym is located on L5 from 7am - 10pm 
- Trash chutes are available on every floor
- Private stackable washer/dryerGetting AroundParking Information: Each unit has two parking spaces not assigned are conveniently located on the first four floors of the building and are included in your stay. Each parking space is $40 per stay. Vehicles must be registered to the individual condo to park in the parking garage.

Some rental companies we would recommend are Outlaw Rentals, California Rentals, Budget Scooter & Golf Cart Rentals.

The Scallop by Brightwild | Beachfront C.description:
This coastline condo boasts amazing views, stylish decor, and gorgeous ceramic tiling throughout. The open-concept living space & dining area include stainless steel appliances, a flat-screen TV, and plenty of seating for your comfort. Enjoy Florida's emerald coast day & night right from the balcony! Book our 716 sqft condo to relax and unwind in Destin in the best way possible.The SpaceThis comfortable unit has a dining area that seats four. Each comes with a bright décor and a living room including a sofa bed and cable TV with a DVD player. All come with a bathroom and a guest toilet. SunDestin Beach has a spa on site. Guests can also work out in the fitness center or play in the games room. A coin-operated laundry facility is available on each floor. Silver Sands Factory Stores is 4 miles from the resort, and Destin - Fort Walton Beach Airport is 30 minutes' drive away. Gulf Getaway by Brightwild | Condo w/Poo.description:
Conveniently situated in the picturesque Truman Annex gated Community, Gulf Getaway is a charming 2 bedroom 2.5 bath perfect for your next island getaway. 

In addition to its prime location, this storybook corner unit features 2 private balconies off of each bedroom and a back deck equipped with all of your outdoor dining necessities. Close enough to everything, but just far enough away Gulf Getaway allows you to enjoy the peaceful serenity of Key West.The SpaceOn the second floor you will find the 2 bedrooms, each featuring a queen size bed, attached full bathroom and balcony. Perfect for accommodating 4-6 guests, additional sleeping arrangements can be found in the queen pullout couch on the first floor.

The open first floor plan with a half bath is perfect for relaxing after a long day. Equipped with an LG cable tv, complimentary Wifi and French doors leading out to the back deck, the natural sunlight in Gulf Getaway keeps the space bright and airy. From an espresso maker, to a Keurig and smoothie maker, the rooster-themed kitchen is stocked with all of your cooking and drink necessities. There is also a hose outside for washing off sand from the beach and a private back entrance to make accessing the back patio a breeze.Guest AccessOur contactless check-in procedure makes check-in easy. Guests will receive a personalized access code prior to check-in to enter the unit. 
Shared Community Features: This home also includes access to the neighborhood pool- exclusive to Truman Annex homes and has lounge chairs perfect for sunbathing. 
How to Access: the bedrooms are located on the second floor with stair access only.NeighborhoodExplore all that Key West has to offer including Truman Annex’s brand new Waterfront park and pier overlooking the Gulf. On Thursdays catch the sunset farmers market at the park or bring the kids to the splash pad for a fun-filled waterpark adventure. Just a 2 block stroll from the world-famous Duval Street, Gulf Getaway is walking distance to endless shopping and dining options.Other things to note- In the upstairs hall closet, you will find a stackable washer and dryer.

Duval's Duet on Duval by Brightwild.description:
Located right in the heart of the World Famous Duval Street, enjoy a true downtown Key West experience! Duval's Duet offers a central location to Key West’s main attractions and everything else the Southernmost city has to offer. With a balconies overlooking Duval Street you can be as much connected to or above the action as your whim desires.
This family-friendly combo is great for sleeping a large group of up to 18 guests!The SpaceFully equipped with a kitchen, living room, dining area and balcony overlooking Duval Street, these lofts feature everything you need. The kitchen is contains a stove, refrigerator, dishwasher and Keurig coffee machine. 

The sleeping arrangements consist of the following: 
Loft 1:  First floor bedroom with a king size bed, an upstairs loft with two king size beds and a pull out couch in the living room. 

Loft 2:  First floor bedroom with a king size bed, an upstairs loft with two king size beds and two pull out couches in the living room. 

There is 1 full bathroom in each unit located in the hallway on the first floor.

Book Duval's Duet for your group's next Key West vacation!Guest AccessOur contactless check-in procedure makes check-in easy. Guest will receive a personalized access code prior to arrival.NeighborhoodOn the 500 block of Duval, Duval's Duet is centralized to everything Key West. 
In the heart of Duval street you can find many of locals favorite's such as: Fausto's Food Market, Keys Coffee Co., and Cuban Coffee Queen, and tourist attractions such as: The Ernest Hemingway house, Mallory Square and Key West Lighthouse, all walking distance from your front door! 
Looking for a night out, find Willy T's, Fogarty's and Fat Tuesday's within 1 block of these units.
Being in the heart of everything does come with noise of Duval street, but nonetheless an easy and convenient location to experience all Key West has to offer!Other things to note- This property consists of 2 historic lofts and can only be accessed by a flight of stairs.  There is no elevator available.

St. Martin Suite | Beautifully Updated,.title: St. Martin Suite | Beautifully Updated, Pool View
St. Martin Suite | Beautifully Updated,.description:
- Welcome to the tropical & relaxing Sunrise Suites Resort, located on the quiet side of Key West!
- Just 1 mile from world famous Smathers Beach where aqua blue waters & white sand awaits. 
- Only a 10 minute ride to downtown Duval Street restaurants, attractions & nightlife. 
- 2nd floor unit with pool & hot tub view, along with elevator access.
- Your stay includes access to all of your must-haves: shared hot tub, heated pool, walking paths, biking trails, tennis court & laundry facilities!The SpaceShiplap accent walls and vaulted ceilings surround you in this newly renovated 2 bedroom, 2 bath. Sleeping up to 6, Saint Martin Suite features a master king bedroom as well as a queen bedroom. If you’re looking for additional sleeping space, look no further than the living room that features a queen size fold out sofa. 
A perfect addition to sitting on your private balcony, the open-concept kitchen includes a Keurig coffee maker, dishwasher, microwave, stove and refrigerator. There is central AC, private parking for 1 vehicle at this unit as well as internet, TV, and cable.Guest AccessOur contactless check-in procedure makes check-in easy. Guests will receive a personalized access code prior to check-in to enter the unit.

Shared Features: The guests of this condominium are able to take advantage of the shared hot tub, shared washer and dryer, shared pool, and tennis courts.NeighborhoodSaint Martin Suite is located inside of the Sunrise Suites Resort Community located just minutes away from the World Famous Duval Street and its vibrant restaurants, art galleries and nightlife. Inside the community you can find a corner store, spa, walking and biking trails. It is also located just a short drive away from the nightly Sunset Celebration and entertainment at Mallory Square.Other things to note- This unit is located close to the airport.
- Washer & Dryers are shared and available on the ground floor of the building.
- Pets are welcome!
Our requirements are as follows: 
•40lb maximum per pet
•$15/night per pet
•2 pet maximum
Pets must be crated when left unattended in the unit. 
Please let us know if you plan on bringing your pet.Getting AroundParking Information: There is 1 private parking spot located under the building for this condo. 
For additional parking: there are spots located around the perimeter of the building available on a first-come first-serve basis. We can not guarantee close proximity to your unit or availability.

There are a variety of great ways to explore Key West including by bicycle, pedi-cab, moke, scooter, golf cart, Uber, or Taxi. Feel free to ask us for recommendations!

The Exuma Cay by Brightwild | Pool View.title: The Exuma Cay by Brightwild | Pool View & Parking
The Exuma Cay by Brightwild | Pool View.description:
- Welcome to the quiet Sunrise Suites community located on the southeast side of Key West.
- Just 1 mile from the beach where aqua blue waters & loungers await. 
- Only a 10 minute ride to downtown Duval Street restaurants, attractions & nightlife. 
- Serene coastal vibe 2 bedroom 3rd floor condo.
- Your stay includes access to all of your must-haves: shared hot tub, heated pool, walking paths, biking trails, tennis court & laundry facilities!The SpaceThis condo has a spacious floor plan, master bedroom with in suite bath, private balcony with east-facing pool views and free off-street parking.  Sleeping up to 6, this beach-themed condo featured a king bed, a queen bed and a fold out sofa in the living room. All of your cooking essentials are provided in the kitchen, along with ample countertop space and a Keurig coffee maker for your morning brew. There is central AC at this unit as well as internet, TV, and cable.Guest AccessOur contactless check-in procedure makes check-in easy. Guests will receive a personalized access code prior to arrival.

Shared Community Features: The guests of this condominium are able to take advantage of the shared hot tub, shared washer and dryer, shared pool, tennis courts, sunbathing decks with lounge chairs and coin laundry on the ground floorNeighborhoodCentrally located and secluded on lush, private grounds, our property is the ideal destination for anyone seeking relaxation and comfort. This tranquil getaway is set in a tropical paradise in the heart of Key West, just one mile from the beach, steps away from some of the best biking and walking trails and only a 5 minute drive to the best attractions and famous bars including Duval Street's vibrant nightlife, restaurant's and galleries.
Inside the community you can find a corner store, spa, walking and biking trails. It is also located just a short drive away from the nightly Sunset Celebration and entertainment at Mallory Square.Other things to noteFree parking for 1 vehicle included with your stay
This unit is located close to the airport.
Private washer and dryer in unit
This unit is pet friendly! Our requirements are as follows: 
•40lb maximum per pet
•$15/night per pet
•2 pet maximum
Pets must be crated when left unattended in the unit. Please let us know if you plan on bringing your pet.Getting AroundOne of the best parts of staying in Key West is how close in proximity you are to everything, this small little 2x4 island offers a variety of ways to get to and from your destination! Don’t feel like walking? Peddle your way to breakfast, or take a bike ride along the water at sunset, by renting from Fury or Island Bicycles who offer both pick up & drop off of bike services! Feel like you’re on island time when you rent from Minty’s where you can enjoy exploring Key West on a scooter or golf cart! In addition to these non-traditional modes of transportation, you can also Uber, Lyft or Taxi to your next destination. Pink Taxi is an easy, reliable and affordable way for getting to your rental from the airport.

There is 1 parking spot available per apartment. However, the spots are not marked. They are available on a first-come first-serve basis so we can not guarantee close proximity to your unit. 

A second parking spot is a possibility and based off of parking lot vacancy. Should you see an additional spot, you may park free of charge.

Garden of Roses | Tropical Conch Home, P.title: Garden of Roses | Tropical Conch Home, Pvt Hot Tub
Garden of Roses | Tropical Conch Home, P.description:
Feel like a Key West local by immersing yourself in the heart of all the action at Garden of Roses! This 3-bed, 2-bath, "monthly" rental is the perfect home for your next stay in paradise. Located on the corner of Whitehead St and Louisa St,  you are within walking distance to Ft Zach Beach, Blue Heaven, the Southernmost Point, and much more! Garden of Roses offers a private hot tub, off street parking, fully fenced-in yard and a lush, tropical outdoor area for you to relax in the FL sunshine!The SpaceThis historic Key West "conch" home has been recently remodeled, combining modern comfort with historic charm.

Sleeping up to 8 guests, the bed layout allows for ample privacy, space and comfort: 
Bedroom 1: 1 King Bed
Bedroom 2: 1 Queen Bed
Bedroom 3: 2 Twin Beds
Extra Sleeping: 1 Sofa Bed in living room

Natural lighting floods the living space, keeping the room open and airy for a relaxing day. The included WiFi allows for the perfect work from home experience. Or, catch up on all your favorite reality TV shows by watching one of the four cable TVs with streaming apps. 

The farmhouse style kitchen with modern appliances and granite countertops is fully equipped and allows for plenty of cooking space. Conveniently, the door in the kitchen opens up to a private terrace with a gas grill and dining table, great for entertaining.

Headed to Key West with the intent to be outside? Relax in private hot tub after a long day, or at one of the 3 outdoor seating areas around the property to soak up the island sun.Guest AccessOur contactless check-in procedure makes check-in easy. Guest will receive a personalized access code prior to arrival.NeighborhoodThis home is located just a block away from world-famous Duval Street where you can find shopping, dining, and year-round entertainment and special events. Walk a half a block to a beautiful public pool with a view of the water! Visit the Key West Butterfly and Nature Conservatory (also on Duval Street) to see over 50 butterfly species along with a number of exotic birds from around the world. Head over to Fort Zachary Taylor Historic State Park to explore the fort and hit the sandy beaches. As previously menyioned, the Southernmost Point is just a few short blocks away.Other things to note- Private stackable washer/dryer
- Pets allowed
- Large off-street Parking Space available and included in your stay
- Central AC
- Mid-stay cleans are available upon request.Getting AroundOne of the best parts of staying in Key West is how close in proximity you are to everything. Don’t feel like walking? Peddle your way to breakfast, or take a bike ride along the water at sunset. Rent your bikes or scooters from Fury or Island Bicycles who offer both pick up & drop off services to your home! Feel like you’re on island time when you rent from Minty’s where you can enjoy exploring Key West on a scooter or golf cart. In addition to these non-traditional modes of transportation, you can also Uber, Lyft or Taxi to your next destination. Pink Taxi is an easy, reliable and affordable way for getting to your rental from the airport.

This stand alone home also includes a private large off-street parking space, perfect for vehicles of any size!

Creme Brulee Suite by Brightwild | Pool.title: Creme Brulee Suite by Brightwild | Pool & Grill
Creme Brulee Suite by Brightwild | Pool.description:
Banana's Foster Guest House is a charming, historic home situated in the heart of Key West. This unique old conch home is located in one of the most desirable areas, just steps away from the historic seaport and downtown. After a day of exploration, you can relax by taking a dip in the shared pool or enjoy a barbecue on the shared patio, where you can also meet other guests. The guest house is divided into six different units, allowing you to reserve one or all of them for your next vacation!The SpaceSweet like the sugar on the top of Creme Brûlée this cute second floor king studio is apart of the larger Banana’s Foster Guesthouse. Bask in the sun on the shared balcony overlooking Caroline Street. Use the mini fridge for left overs, the microwave for late night munchies and a Keurig coffee maker for your morning brew. The ensuite private bath has a walk-in shower and modern vanity for getting ready.Guest AccessOur contactless check-in procedure makes check-in easy. Guests will receive a personalized access code prior to arrival.NeighborhoodPlaced perfectly in-between Downtown and the Historic seaport, enjoy attractions like Mallory Square at sunset, Fury’s water adventures for a day at sea, and the Shipwreck and Mel Fisher Maritime Museum for some Key West History.

Being in the heart of everything does come with noise of downtown, but nonetheless an easy and convenient location to experience all Key West has to offer!

Half a block from Duval Street, The Banana's Foster Guesthouse, is steps away from Key Wests most famous bars and kitchens. Food is at your finger tips, local’s favorite restaurants, such as First Flight, Bagatelle and Two Friend’s patio are less than a 5 minute walk from your front door. Got a sweet tooth, keep an eye out for Kermit’s Key Lime pie shop in the Historic Seaport known for the best Key Lime Pie in Key West, or some homemade fudge and candy from River Street Sweets.

Forgot something and or need a quick fix, Shorty’s Market has your last minute necessities for your weekend getaway. Just 2 blocks away you can also find Fausto’s food market for locally sourced groceries.Other things to noteThis studio is part of Banana's Foster Guest House, which can accommodate a much larger group of up to 18.
This home has one dedicated parking space on the Simonton Street side of the property.
Please park in the space that is labeled "Creme Brulee". 
This unit is pet friendly! Our requirements are as follows: 
•40lb maximum per pet
•$15/night per pet
•2 pet maximum
Please let us know if you plan on bringing your pet.
Pool is shared on site and not heated
There is no onsite laundry at this property.Getting AroundOne of the best parts of staying in Key West is how close in proximity you are to everything, this small little 2x4 island offers a variety of ways to get to and from your destination! Don’t feel like walking? Peddle your way to breakfast, or take a bike ride along the water at sunset, by renting from Fury or Island Bicycles who offer both pick up & drop off of bike services! Feel like you’re on island time when you rent from Minty’s where you can enjoy exploring Key West on a scooter or golf cart! In addition to these non-traditional modes of transportation, you can also Uber, Lyft or Taxi to your next destination. Pink Taxi is an easy, reliable and affordable way for getting to your rental from the airport.
amenities: Flat smooth pathway to front door
Path to entrance lit at night

Each of the bedrooms feature a comfy king size bed and ensuite bathroom. For extra sleeping the 2 couches in living room pull out into a queen size and full size bed. 
Prepare dinners in the gourmet kitchen, with ample countertop space, natural sunlight, and all of your cooking needs to laugh around the dining room table at dinner time. Step out onto the back deck where the shared pool is located or grill your fresh catch on the back deck. •2 pet maximum

There are a variety of great ways to explore Key West including by bicycle, pedi-cab, moke, scooter, golf cart, Uber, Taxi, or by feet. As this unit is located in downtown Key West, many attractions are within walking distance. Feel free to ask us for recommendations!
