The Adaline 1 | Luxury Hyde Park Apt Nea.title: The Adaline 1 | Luxury Hyde Park Apt Near Bayshore
The Adaline 1 | Luxury Hyde Park Apt Nea.description:
Immerse yourself in South Tampa luxury at The Adaline #1! 

Nestled in the heart of Hyde Park, this professionally decorated 1st floor apartment provides unparalleled comfort and quality. The main bedroom features a Queen bed with a Purple Restore hybrid mattress, while the Twin BR and Queen pull out offer enough room to sleep up to 5 guests. With Bayshore Blvd just steps away and Downtown Tampa a 10 minute drive away, The Adaline's central location is perfect for your next stay in Tampa Bay.The SpaceThis first floor apartment features a fully updated kitchen, new laundry machines, a Queen Bedroom, a Twin Bedroom and a Queen Sized Pullout couch in the living area. This unit can accommodate up to five guests making it the perfect home base for your next trip to Tampa Bay!

There were no details spared in the recent renovation of this Historic flat! In the open concept living space you can find a comfortable Queen Sized Pullout Couch and Smart TV ready for you to entertain. The kitchen is complete with new stainless steel appliances, a Brita water filter and a Keurig Coffee station stocked with a complimentary starter supply of coffee! The primary bedroom features a Queen Sized Bed with the aforementioned Purple Restore mattress, and the secondary bedroom features a Twin Sized Bed. Just outside the upgraded bathroom you'll find brand new compact laundry machines stocked with a starter supply of laundry soap and dryer sheets. 

Enjoy free high speed WiFi and stay in to enjoy all the Adaline #1 has to offer when you stay with us!Guest AccessGuests will receive a 6-digit access code that opens the door to unit. Guests will also receive a 4 digit access code to the building.NeighborhoodHyde Park is a centrally located, historic district loved by locals and visitors alike. Bayshore Boulevard is right outside your doorstep, known as one of the longest continuous sidewalks in the United States! Bayshore Boulevard is 4.5 miles of scenic views and outdoor exercise equipment paralleling Tampa Bay. Hyde Park Village is an outdoor shopping mall just a 5 minute walk away with dining, shopping and various pop-up events! A variety of parks, Downtown Tampa and the Tampa International Airport are all a 10 minute drive away or less!

Some of our teams' favorite nearby hotspots include Armature Works, Tampa Riverwalk, Sparkman Wharf, Hyde Park Village, SoHo District, Ybor City & Downtown Tampa!Other things to note- PETS: 1 pet per unit. $15/day fee
- SMOKING: smoking is strictly prohibited in the unit and on the property grounds. Smoking will result in a $500 fine
- Please note that there are long term tenants that reside on this property and some do have pets
- Pull Out Bed Sheets are located in the built-in shelves next to the laundry machines.
- Private washer and dryerGetting AroundHyde Park is a very walkable neighborhood but there are self-service bicycles available for rent on Bayshore Boulevard. There are also electric scooters for rent in the area via any of the scooter rental apps. (Bird, Uber, Lime, etc.)  If you are planning on exploring the Tampa Bay Area, there are many car rental storefronts at the airport and in the surrounding area! Tampa has a plethora of street parking, garage parking and pay by app parking.

Grande Hyde Out by Brightwild | RARE Fin.title: Grande Hyde Out by Brightwild | RARE Find!
Grande Hyde Out by Brightwild | RARE Fin.description:
Perfect for large groups, The Grande Hyde Out consists of 2 separate rentals - The Hyde Out and The Lil' Hyde Out - which are located right next to each other on a quiet street in the heart of Hyde Park.  This unique property offers a total of 4 bedrooms, 2 separate kitchens, 2 separate living areas, 3 off street parking spots, an outdoor patio, grill, cornhole, and plenty of space for you and your friends or family to stretch out and relax.The SpaceTHE HYDE OUT (Main house - 3 Bedrooms, 2 Bathrooms)

This single story bungalow nestled in the Hyde Park community features a full-sized, fully-stocked kitchen, three bedrooms and two bathrooms, ideal for your next Tampa Bay getaway! Sleeping up to 8 guests, this home has a main bedroom that sleeps two, a secondary bedroom that sleeps four with a bed and additional trundle bed, as well as a comfy pull-out sofa in the living room that sleeps two. The updated kitchen features beautiful stainless steel countertops and a full sized-fridge, microwave, oven, stove top and cookware to make staying in a breeze! Utilize the laundry room with your own washer and  machines and complimentary laundry detergent, located in the back of the home. Enjoy free high speed WiFi and smart TVs with access to YouTube TV and all your favorite streaming apps. Sit back and relax, grill out, or play some cornhole in your own private outdoor space via the gate next to the back door. 

Experience historic Hyde Park, the vibrant SoHo district, or world famous Bern's Steakhouse - all just a short walk away! Are you an early riser? Head down to Bayshore Blvd and catch the breathtaking sunrises over Downtown Tampa every morning!

LIL' HYDE OUT (Back Studio - 1 Bedroom, 1 Bathroom)

This 1st floor one-bed one-bath unit features a full kitchen, one queen bed in the bedroom, one queen pull-out sofa in the living room and one full bathroom allowing up to 4 guests to stay comfortably. This newly updated space contains a full-sized refrigerator, stove, microwave, toaster, kettle, blender, Brita water filter, and Keurig. Enjoy free high speed WiFi and a smart TV with access to all your favorite streaming apps!



SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS
Main House King Bedroom 1: King bed
Main House King Bedroom 2: King bed
Main House Twin Bedroom: 2 Single beds
Back Studio Bedroom: Queen bed

Shared spaces
Main House Living Room: Queen Sofa bed
Back Studio Living Room: Queen Sofa bedGuest AccessGuests will receive a 6 digit access code prior to their arrival.NeighborhoodHyde Park is a centrally located, historic district loved by locals and visitors alike. Beautiful Bayshore Blvd is just a few blocks from your doorstep, known as one of the longest continuous sidewalks in the United States! Bayshore Blvd is 4.5 miles of scenic views and outdoor exercise equipment paralleling Tampa Bay. Hyde Park Village - just a short walk away - is a bustling hot spot for delicious dining, unique coffee shops, desirable boutiques, and vibrant bars! A variety of family-friendly parks, Downtown Tampa and the Tampa International Airport are all a 10 minute drive away or less!Other things to note- SMOKING: this is a NON smoking property, smoking inside the unit will result in a $250 fine
- PETS: 2 dogs each under 30 lbs is allowed at this property. Pet fee is $15 per pet, per day
- TRASH INFO: Trash days are on Tuesday and Friday. Trash cans are located in the driveway
- Please notes that there is a long term tenant that lives in the back building on the second floor.Getting AroundHyde Park is a very walkable neighborhood but there are also self-service bicycles available for rent on Bayshore Boulevard. There are also electric scooters for rent in the area via any of the scooter rental apps. (Bird, Uber, Lime, etc.)  If you are planning on exploring the Tampa Bay Area, there are many car rental storefronts at the airport and in the surrounding area! Tampa has a plethora of street parking, garage parking and pay by app parking.

3BR Condo - Ocean View & Beach Access at.description:
Set on seven acres of property overlooking the Gulf of Mexico, experience luxury at Beachside Resort & Residences. Unwind in the perfect blend of adventure and relaxation in sunny Key West.

On property, you can find access to our resort pool, ocean marina, and the ability to book a sandbar or sunset cruise.

Don’t miss out on fine dining at our award winning restaurant, Tavern N Town, or grab a delectable meal poolside at Chicken Walk.The SpaceOur three-bedroom, three-bathroom condo provides everything you need for your next getaway to Beachside Key West.

Sleeping arrangements include:
Bedroom 1: King bed and en-suite bathroom with a double vanity and whirlpool tub

Living Area: Queen sleeper sofa

Our luxury resort offers a 24-hour heated pool, hot tub, on-site marina, restaurant and waterview fitness center.
Guests have access to a local Guest Experience Manager (GEM) for recommendations such as on-site bike rentals, water excursions, and our favorite places to eat.NeighborhoodConveniently located on north Key West, Beachside Resort sits on an ideal seven acres of land situated just 10 minutes from Duval Street, ensuring you can be as close or as far from the ‘happenings’ as you’d like. Hidden Oasis | Gorgeous Home, w/ Pvt Poo.title: Hidden Oasis | Gorgeous Home, w/ Pvt Pool
Hidden Oasis | Gorgeous Home, w/ Pvt Poo.description:
Hidden Oasis is a 28-night minimum rental, offering contemporary luxury in the heart of Midtown, Key West. It’s just half a mile from Smathers Beach and a quick ten-minute drive to Duval Street & downtown. 

This home boasts an open floor plan on a private fenced-in yard situated on a corner lot with lush tropical landscaping. Step through french doors to the backyard, with a private heated pool, lounge seating, a TV, a grill, and a soothing waterfall feature, making it the perfect retreat!The SpaceAdorned with contemporary flare and modern finishes, Hidden Oasis is a three bedroom, two bath home sleeping up to six guests. 

Bedroom 1: King bed located on the first floor of the home. Features: floor to ceiling mirrors, smart tv, patio doors, ceiling fan and steps to the downstairs full bathroom. 
Bathroom 1: Spacious tiled floors with extra vanity storage and frosted glass shower

Bedroom 2: Follow the spiral staircase to the bright and airy master bedroom with a king bed featuring a corner make-up vanity, private balcony, platform bed with storage, smart tv and vaulted ceilings.
Bathroom 2:  Stone pebbled luxury master bathroom with dual glass bowl sinks and walk-in shower. 

Bedroom 3: Adjacent to the living area and has been designed with two built in daybeds offering flexibility. 

Custom built cabinets surround the newly remodeled kitchen with stainless steel appliances, a double door fridge and adjacent dining area. Build in bench seating provides comfort and storage for family dinners, along with a breakfast bar. 

This is a perfect work from home space with a spacious desk, printer and ample storage!Guest AccessOur self check-in makes the process seamless.
Guests will receive a personalized access code prior to arrival and direct contact to a local guest experience manager for any questions, needs or recommendations during their stay.NeighborhoodThis home sits on a quiet residential street in a relaxing area of Key West known as "Mid-Town" and is located just a few blocks from popular Higgs Beach, Salute Beach Bar and volleyball and pickleball courts! You'll be just a 5 minute drive or 10 minute bike ride from Duval Street and Key West's local attractions including nightlife, historic attractions, restaurants, and shopping.
Ask your GEM for their favorite things-to-do and places-to-go!Other things to note-This property has a 28-night minimum.
-Pets are welcome, but please let us know if you are planning to bring your furry friend(s). Please note that we do have a couple of requirements in place to keep our properties in tip-top shape.
1. Pets are to be no more than 40lbs.
2. We will add an additional $15 per night, per pet to your tab.
3. We have a two pet maximum.
- There is a private washer and dryer. To get you started we supply detergent and dryer sheets.
- Mid-stay cleans are available upon request. 
- Note: 3rd bedroom is a small denGetting AroundParking Information:
There is parking for up to 4 vehicles included with your stay. Parking is located around the perimeter of the property. We can provide you with recommendations for parking additional vehicles upon request!

There are a variety of great ways to explore Key West including by bicycle, pedi-cab, moke, scooter, golf cart, Uber, Taxi, or by feet. As this unit is located in downtown Key West, many attractions are within walking distance. Feel free to ask us for recommendations!

The Adaline by Brightwild | Entire Compl.title: The Adaline by Brightwild | Entire Complex
The Adaline by Brightwild | Entire Compl.description:
Step into historic luxury with the Adaline! Nestled in the heart of Hyde Park, each individual unit features a fully updated kitchen, laundry machines and stunning natural light. This cozy nine-unit building sleeps up to 40 guests with 10 Queen Beds, 9 Queen Pullout Beds, and 2 Twin Beds, making it the ideal spot for you and your guests! With Bayshore Boulevard just steps away and Downtown Tampa a 5 minute drive away, The Adaline's central location is perfect for your next trip to Tampa Bay!The SpaceThe Adaline #1 - This first floor apartment features a fully updated kitchen, laundry machines, a Queen Bedroom, a Twin Bedroom and a Queen Sized Pullout couch in the living area. This unit can accommodate up to 5 guests.

The Adaline #2 - This first floor apartment features a fully updated kitchen, private washer & dryer, a sunlit dining nook, Queen bedroom and a Queen Sized Pullout couch in the living area. This unit can accommodate up to 4 guests. 

The Adaline #3 - This first floor apartment features a fully updated kitchen, laundry machines, a Queen Bedroom, Twin Bedroom, and a Queen Sized Pullout couch in the living area. This unit can accommodate up to 5 guests.

The Adaline #4 - This first floor apartment features a fully updated kitchen, private washer & dryer, a sunlit dining nook, Queen bedroom and a Queen Sized Pullout couch in the living area. This unit can accommodate up to 4 guests. 

The Adaline #5 - This second floor apartment features a fully updated kitchen, laundry machines, a sunlit dining nook, a Queen Bedroom and a Queen Sized Pullout couch in the living area. This unit can accommodate up to 4 guests.

The Adaline #6 - This second floor apartment features a fully updated kitchen, laundry machines, a sunlit dining nook, a Queen Bedroom and a Queen Sized Pullout couch in the living area. This unit can accommodate up to 4 guests.

The Adaline #7 - This second floor apartment features a fully updated kitchen, laundry machines, a sunlit dining nook, a Queen Bedroom and a Queen Sized Pullout couch in the living area. This unit can accommodate up to 4 guests.

The Adaline #8 - This second floor apartment features a fully updated kitchen, laundry machines, a sunlit dining nook, a Queen Bedroom and a Queen Sized Pullout couch in the living area. This unit can accommodate up to 4 guests.

The Adaline #9 - This second floor apartment, separate from the others, features a fully updated kitchen, laundry machines, two Queen Bedrooms and a Queen Sized Pullout couch in the living area. This unit can accommodate up to 6 guests.

There were no details spared in the recent renovation of these Historic flats! All nine units have an open concept living space where you'll find a comfortable Queen Sized Pullout Couch and Smart TV ready for you to entertain and each bedroom features plenty of closet space. The kitchens are complete with new stainless steel appliances, a Brita water filter and a Keurig Coffee station stocked with a complimentary starter supply of coffee! Just outside the upgraded bathroom you'll find brand new laundry machines stocked with a starter supply of laundry soap and dryer sheets. Enjoy free high speed WiFi and stay in to enjoy all the Adaline has to offer when you stay with us!Guest AccessGuests will receive a 6-digit access code that opens the door to each unit. Guests will also receive a 4 digit access code to the building.NeighborhoodHyde Park is a centrally located, historic district loved by locals and visitors alike. Bayshore Boulevard is right outside your doorstep, known as one of the longest continuous sidewalks in the United States! Bayshore Boulevard is 4.5 miles of scenic views and outdoor exercise equipment paralleling Tampa Bay. Hyde Park Village is an outdoor shopping mall just a 5 minute walk away with dining, shopping and various pop-up events! A variety of parks, Downtown Tampa and the Tampa International Airport are all a 10 minute drive away or less!

Some of our teams' favorite nearby hotspots include Armature Works, Tampa Riverwalk, Sparkman Wharf, Hyde Park Village, SoHo District, Ybor City & Downtown Tampa!Other things to note- PETS: 1 pet per unit. $15/night fee.
- SMOKING: smoking is strictly prohibited in the unity and on the property grounds. Smoking will result in a $500 fine.
- Please note that there are long term tenants that reside on this property and some do have pets.
- If your unit has a pull-out bed, the sheets are located in the built-in shelves next to the laundry machines.Getting AroundHyde Park is a very walkable neighborhood but there are self-service bicycles available for rent on Bayshore Boulevard. There are also electric scooters for rent in the area via any of the scooter rental apps. (Bird, Uber, Lime, etc.)  If you are planning on exploring the Tampa Bay Area, there are many car rental storefronts at the airport and in the surrounding area! Tampa has a plethora of street parking, garage parking and pay by app parking.

Casa Padrón | Gorgeous Home Steps to 7th.title: Casa Padrón | Gorgeous Home Steps to 7th Ave
Casa Padrón | Gorgeous Home Steps to 7th.description:
Welcome to the incredible and stunning "Casa Padrón" - a modern 2 bed, 2 bath home that sits just 3 short blocks from 7th Ave & Centro Ybor! Enjoy all new furnishings, super comfortable beds, private off-street parking and a private porch! This home was recently renovated and offers top-of-the-line bedding, furniture, and fixtures.The SpaceMake the most of vibrant Ybor City when you stay at Casa Padrón! This recently renovated, historic home features an upgraded kitchen with brand new stainless steel appliances, a private outdoor dining are and ample space to spread out and settle in. 

Casa Padrón is the perfect home base for up to 5 guests featuring a King Bedroom, a Queen Bedroom, a twin pull-out sofa in the living room and two full private bathrooms stocked with the best toiletries! There is off street, private parking located on site as well as full sized laundry machines to make your stay here a breeze. 

Casa Padrón boasts natural light throughout the entire home, offers brand new mattresses and high speed WiFi so you can vacation in total comfort. Check-In, sit back and relax when you stay with Brightwild!

The open concept living space has plenty of seating, a Smart HD TV and access to the private outdoor dining area. The spacious kitchen is equipped with brand new Bertazzoni appliances as well as cookware and dishware for use throughout your stay. We provide a Keurig coffee machine fully stocked with coffee, creamer and sweeteners so your morning brew is on us!

The home has a King Bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, a Queen Bedroom, a twin pull-out sofa in the living room, and an additional full private bathroom. Take in the historic Ybor City streets on your front porch swing or share a meal in your private outdoor dining area.Guest AccessGuests will receive a 6-digit access code that opens the rear entrance.NeighborhoodFounded in the 1880s, the Historic Ybor City district is well known for its eclectic collection of culture and countless cigar factories in which the city was named, for Don Vincent Martinez Ybor. Take a stroll down the original red brick streets and step into a piece of history. Indulge in a comedy show at The Improv, dine at the historic Columbia Restaurant or explore the local shops, bars, and artisans that make the Ybor community so rich!

"Casa Padron" lies in a safe neighborhood that boasts several newly constructed homes.  Take advantage of the newly opened coffee shop - just down the street - or stroll down to the dog park with your furry friend! Please be advised, though, guests may experience noise on the weekends due to its proximity to nearby restaurants and bars.Other things to notePets - Small to medium sized pets are considered for this home. There is a 35 lb weight limit and $15 fee per day, per pet.
Noise - Please note you may experience noise especially on weekends due to the home's proximity to Centro Ybor
Smoking - This is a non-smoking property. Smoking of any kind in the interior of the home will result in a $500 fine.
Trash Info -Trash days are on Tuesday and Friday. Trash cans are located by the street in the front of home.Getting AroundYbor City is notorious for the street trolley system- it's free, runs every 15 minutes and has many stops throughout Ybor, Downtown Tampa and Channelside! Ybor City is a very walkable neighborhood however, there are also self-service bicycles and electric scooters available for rent in the area via any of the scooter rental apps. (Bird, Uber, Lime, etc.)  If you are planning on exploring the Greater Tampa Bay Area, there are many car rental storefronts at the airport and in the surrounding area! Tampa and Ybor City have a plethora of street parking, garage parking and pay by app parking.

SoHo Siesta | Stunning SoHo Apt w/ Priva.title: SoHo Siesta | Stunning SoHo Apt w/ Private Balcony
SoHo Siesta | Stunning SoHo Apt w/ Priva.description:
Settle in and unwind at your home away from home at the SoHo Siesta! Located in the heart of the vibrant SoHo Area and historic Hyde Park, you can choose whether you want to stay in or go out. This second floor suite sleeps up to 6 guests, featuring a queen sized pull-out couch in the main living area, a queen bedroom and a full sized bedroom. Enjoy a cup of coffee on your private balcony, take a walk around the neighborhood or venture out and explore the rest of what Tampa Bay has to offer!The SpaceStep into historic charm with this recently updated suite featuring a full-sized kitchen with a built-in dining nook, laundry machines and a private balcony. Look no further for the perfect home base to elevate your experience and vacation in comfort! 

Sleeping up to 6 guests, this flat is perfect to spread out and make yourself at home! This one-bath, two-bedroom unit includes a queen-sized bed in the primary bedroom, a full-sized bed in the back sunroom and a queen-sized pull-out couch in the living area. The bathroom features an above-ground garden tub and complimentary toiletries for your stay! Please keep in mind the back sunroom is only accessible via the queen bedroom as shown in the photos. Enjoy the private balcony overlooking the historic streets of Hyde Park at your outdoor dinette table!

Carefully designed with you in mind, no details were spared in creating the perfect haven in this home! The tastefully upgraded kitchen features an oven, dishwasher and a fully stocked Keurig coffee machine for your convenience. Gather around and enjoy a meal at the custom-built butcher-block dining space! There is also a washer and dryer complete with a starter supply of laundry soaps + dryer sheets for your use throughout your stay. Enjoy free high-speed Wi-Fi and a smart TV with access to YouTube TV and all your favorite streaming apps!

Downstairs in the rear of the building is a lush garden with a shared common area featuring an outdoor grill, outdoor fire pit and dining table! Feel free to utilize this space during your stay but please be mindful it is shared with other guests and residents.Guest AccessGuests will receive a 6-digit access code that opens the front entrance to the unit.NeighborhoodSouth Howard, or “SoHo”, is one of the most popular areas of Tampa featuring vibrant nightlife, and fun for everyone! Nestled in the heart of Tampa and within walking distance of Bayshore Boulevard, this area is perfect for your next getaway. Bayshore Boulevard has 4.5 miles of scenic views and outdoor exercise equipment paralleling Tampa Bay. Historic Hyde Park Village is an outdoor shopping mall just a 15-minute walk away with dining, shopping and various pop-up events! A variety of parks, Downtown Tampa and the Tampa International Airport are all a 10-minute drive away or less!

Some of our teams' favorite nearby hotspots include Armature Works, Tampa Riverwalk, Sparkman Wharf, Hyde Park Village, SoHo District, Ybor City & Downtown Tampa!Other things to note- This is a non-smoking property. Smoking of any kind in the interior of the home will result in a $500 fine.
- Trash Info: Trash days are on Tuesday and Friday. Trash cans are located in the parking area
- Pets: sorry, no pets allowed
- Parking: This unit offers 1 private off-street parking spot in the lot behind the building.
- Note: There is construction currently ongoing at the intersection of Howard Ave. and Southview Ave. just down the road from the home.Getting AroundSoHo is a very walkable neighborhood but there are self-service bicycles available for rent on Bayshore Boulevard. There are also electric scooters for rent in the area via any of the scooter rental apps. (Bird, Uber, Lime, etc.)  If you are planning on exploring the Tampa Bay Area, there are many car rental storefronts at the airport and in the surrounding area! SoHo Hacienda | Pvt Pool, Great for Big.title: SoHo Hacienda | Pvt Pool, Great for Big Groups!
SoHo Hacienda | Pvt Pool, Great for Big.description:
Nestled on the border of the beautiful Palma Ceia & SoHo neighborhoods, "SoHo Hacienda" is the PERFECT place for you and your amigos to enjoy all that South Tampa has to offer. This impeccable 5 bed, 3 bath home features a sun-filled outdoor area with a private plunge pool, outdoor dining area, poolside loungers, detached poolside suite, modern interior updates, and a propane grill. The home lies just a short distance from Bayshore Beautiful, Downtown Tampa, Hyde Park & SoHo!The SpaceSoHo Hacienda is an updated Spanish-style home with a fully-stocked kitchen and offers a total of four bedrooms and three full bathrooms, ideal for your group's next stay in Tampa Bay! This single story home sits just a few short blocks from bustling S. Howard Ave and is a 3 minute drive from Bayshore Beautiful. 

Sleeping up to 10 guests, the bedding layout is as follows:
Bedroom 1- King bed with en-suite full bathroom
Bedroom 2 - Queen bedroom 
Bedroom 3 - Queen Bedroom 
Pool House Suite - Queen Bed with en-suite full bathroom 
Living Area - full pull out couch 

The updated "chef's" kitchen boasts beautiful black granite countertops, a fridge, freezer, ice maker, microwave, oven, gas range, and is equipped with all the cookware you need! Fully stocked with coffee supplies, wake up and treat yourself to a cup of coffee on your front porch or out back by the sparkling plunge pool. Take advantage of your private laundry room with complimentary laundry detergent, located out back by the pool. 

Enjoy free high speed WiFi and smart TVs with access to YouTube TV and all your favorite streaming apps. Sit back, relax, and grill out in your own private outdoor space via a door connected to the master bedroom or through the gate by the driveway. 

Experience historic Hyde Park, the vibrant SoHo district, The Green Lemon, Bulla Bar, or world famous Bern's Steakhouse - all just a short walk away! Are you an early riser? Head down to Bayshore Blvd and catch the breathtaking sunrises over Downtown Tampa every morning!Guest AccessGuests will receive a 6-digit access code that opens the front door to the unit.NeighborhoodPalma Ceia is a lovely community boasting small local businesses, historic homes and lush scenery. Neighboring both Hyde Park and S Howard Ave, there is never a shortage of things to do! Hyde Park Village is a local favorite and a bustling hot spot for visitors with delicious dining, unique coffee shops, desirable boutiques, and vibrant bars! Bayshore Boulevard is 1/2 a mile away, Downtown Tampa is 3 miles away and the Tampa International Airport is a quick 15-minute drive away. Chill Bros Scoop Shop and Datz + Dough are some of our teams' favorite spots in the area!Other things to note- This is a non-smoking property. Smoking of any kind in the interior of the home will result in a $500 fine.
- Pets: This unit is pet friendly, with 2 pets allowed at $15/day per day, per pet. Please notify us if you plan on bringing a pet before your arrival.
- Parking: This unit offers private parking in the driveway for multiple vehicles as well as FREE street parking.Getting AroundPalma Ceia & SoHo are very walkable areas but there are self-service bicycles available for rent on Bayshore Boulevard. There are also electric scooters for rent in the area via any of the scooter rental apps. (Bird, Uber, Lime, etc.)  If you are planning on exploring the Tampa Bay Area, there are many car rental storefronts at the airport and in the surrounding area! Tampa has a plethora of street parking, garage parking and pay-by-app parking.

The Adaline #3

Step into historic luxury at "The Adaline #3!" Nestled in the heart of Hyde Park and just 1 block from Bayshore Beautiful, this upgraded unit features a fully updated kitchen, laundry machines and stunning natural light. This cozy flat sleeps up to 5 guests with a Queen Sized Bed, Twin Daybed, and a Queen Pullout Couch, making it the ideal spot for you and your guests! The Adaline's central location is perfect for your next getaway.The SpaceThis first floor apartment features a fully updated kitchen, laundry machines, a Queen Bedroom, Twin Bedroom, and a Queen Sized Pullout couch in the living area. There were no details spared in the recent renovation of this historic flat. NEW! Redington Beach Retreat | Steps to.title: NEW! Redington Beach Retreat | Steps to the Beach!
NEW! Redington Beach Retreat | Steps to.description:
Welcome to Redington Beach Retreat - your ideal vacation destination in the quiet little town of Redington Beach! This charming single-story 3-bed, 2-bath home is perfect for families and friends seeking sun, sand, and relaxation. Take advantage of this premier location - with public beach access right across the street where beautiful white sands and jaw dropping sunsets await. The outddor area is perfect for catching sun, and includes a brand new fire pit as of January 2024.The Space"Redington Beach Retreat" offers unparalleled access to the beach, with public beach access right across the street. Spend your days basking in the sun, building sandcastles, or shell searching along the pristine shoreline.

This beach-cottage style home boasts three generously sized bedrooms, allowing you to comfortably accommodate up to six guests. The master bedroom offers a comfy queen bed, full length mirror, and an updated en suite bathroom. The second bedroom consists of two twin beds while the third bedroom offers a a desk, desktop computer (iMac) and a twin trundle bed. 

The living area is ideal for relaxation, with ample seating, a flat-screen TV, and plenty of natural light.

Prepare delicious meals in the fully-equipped kitchen featuring modern appliances and all the cookware and utensils you need. Enjoy your meals in the dining area or take them outside to the patio for an al fresco experience.

The fenced-in backyard provides a private oasis for you to enjoy. Whether it's lounging on the deck, firing up the grill for a BBQ, or letting the kids play in the yard, this outdoor space is perfect for relaxation and recreation.

This vacation home includes a garage for secure parking and storage, ensuring your vehicles and beach gear are safe and sound. Make use of the private washer and dryer in the garage as well


In addition to the beach, this property is equipped with essential amenities such as free Wi-Fi, central air conditioning, a washer and dryer, and more to enhance your stay.

Your escape to Redington Beach promises relaxation, adventure, and unforgettable memories. Whether you're seeking a romantic getaway, a family vacation, or a fun-filled retreat with friends, this vacation rental is the perfect base for your Gulf Coast adventure. Book now and start counting down the days until you're enjoying paradise just steps from the sand!Guest AccessGuests will receive a 6-digit access code that opens the front entrance to the unit.NeighborhoodRedington Beach is known for its tranquility, but you're also just a short drive away from the bustling attractions of St. Pete Beach and Clearwater Beach. Explore local restaurants, shops, and entertainment options, all within easy reach.Other things to note- This unit has a 10 night minimum. For lesser requests, please reach out and we may be able to accommodate.
- PETS: sorry, no pets allowed
- SMOKING: no smoking allowed whatsoever. Smoking at this property will result in $500 fine.Getting AroundRedington Beach is a very walkable neighborhood but there are bicycles and electric scooters available for rent in the area. The Suncoast Beach Trolley runs from Clearwater Beach (north) to Pass-A-Grille (south), and stops at specially marked "Trolley Stop" locations along the entire Gulf Blvd. Uber and Lyft are also available in the area.

Villa Positano by Brightwild | Private H.description:
- Centralized in the middle of Duval Street & walking distance to popular activities!

Bedroom 2: Queen bed with en suite bathroom.

Guests will receive a personalized access code prior to arrival and direct contact to a local guest experience manager for any questions, needs or recommendations during their stay.NeighborhoodOn the 1000 Block of Duval Street located in Duval Square this second story condo is in close proximity all of your Key West favorites. There are a variety of great ways to explore Key West including by bicycle, pedi-cab, moke, scooter, golf cart, Uber, Taxi or by feet. This unit is located in downtown Key West and many attractions are within walking distance. Feel free to ask us for recommendations!

Casa Azul is a luxe modern cottage with an open-concept living area that ends up filled with natural sunlight. Bedroom 1: Queen bed

Bedroom 2: Full bed 
Features: Modern full bathroom, smart TV, blackout shades & closet. 

Unwind with high-speed wifi, a third full bathroom for guest use & an 80 inch TV for entertaining. Or sit in the sun loungers by the amazing pool to soak in the afternoon rays.Guest AccessOur self check-in makes the process seamless.

Reflections 504 | OCEANFRONT, Pool & Bea.title: Reflections 504 | OCEANFRONT, Pool & Beach View
Reflections 504 | OCEANFRONT, Pool & Bea.description:
Welcome to "Reflections on the Gulf 504," your beachfront paradise located in the charming town of Indian Rocks Beach! This lovely 2-bed, 2-bath condo offers breathtaking views of the Gulf of Mexico and stunning sunsets that will leave you in awe. With its prime location, luxurious amenities, and proximity to delicious dining, shops, and beach bars, this vacation rental is the perfect choice for your coastal getaway.The SpaceStep inside this corner unit condo and be greeted by an abundance of natural light flooding through the windows, providing water views from almost every angle. The spacious living area features comfortable seating and a queen sleeper sofa, perfect for relaxing and enjoying the company of your loved ones. The private balcony, complete with a screened-in enclosure, allows you to soak up the gulf breezes while marveling at the picturesque scenery.

The condo comfortably accommodates up to 6 guests, with a king bed in the master bedroom, two twin beds in the second bedroom, and a queen sleeper sofa in the living area. Each bedroom is tastefully decorated and offers a peaceful retreat for a restful night's sleep. The two well-appointed bathrooms ensure convenience and privacy for all.

Indulge in the resort-like amenities offered at "Reflections on the Gulf." Take a refreshing dip in the sparkling pool, unwind in the relaxing hot tub, or challenge your friends to a game of tennis on the on-site court. When it's time to hit the beach, you'll appreciate the direct beach access, allowing you to sink your toes in the sand and soak up the Florida sunshine.

The fully equipped kitchen is a chef's delight, featuring modern appliances and all the necessary tools to prepare a delicious meal. However, if you prefer dining out, you'll find an array of amazing restaurants just a 5-minute drive away. Guppies, Sandy's, JD's Restaurant, Chicago Jax, The Paris Bakery, and Kokomo Tiki Bar are just a few of the fantastic options to satisfy your culinary cravings.

The owners of "Reflections on the Gulf 504" sincerely hope that you will love their property as much as they do. They invite you to relax on the balcony, where you can witness the breathtaking sunsets and gaze at the moon and stars, creating the perfect end to each day of your vacation. Don't miss out on this unforgettable beachfront experience—book your stay today and make lasting memories at Indian Rocks Beach!Guest AccessGuests will receive a 6-digit access code that opens the door to the unit. Guests will also receive a physical key to the building via a lockbox outside the front entrance to the condominium building.

Guests will have access to 1 designated parking spot labeled "504." For guests with multiple vehicles, there is additional parking on site on a first-come, first-served basis for any spots that start with the number 12.

Guests will also have access to the following:
- luggage carts and grocery carts located in the lobby
- Beach chairs, coolers, and beach and umbrellas in the storage closet located down the hall from the condo
- Heated Pool
- Sundeck
- Tennis courts
- Hot tub
- The beach can be accessed by the trail behind the property.NeighborhoodIndian Rocks Beach offers a laid-back atmosphere, perfect for those seeking a peaceful beach retreat. However, if you're craving more excitement, bustling Clearwater Beach is only a 15-minute drive to the north, while St. Pete Beach is just a 30-minute drive to the south. Explore waterfront dining and a vibrant nightlife scene in these popular destinations.

For your convenience, a short drive over the 688 Causeway will lead you to grocery stores like Publix, Walmart, Target, and liquor stores, ensuring that you have everything you need for a comfortable stay.Other things to note- This unit has a 14-night minimum, with no exceptions.
- This unit requires a Saturday check-in and Saturday check-out from January through April.
- Please note that there is minor construction being performed on the exterior of the building, however, little noise will be heard from guests staying in this unit.
- SMOKING: Smoking is strictly prohibited in the unity and on the property grounds. Smoking will result in a $500 fine.
- PETS: Sorry, no pets allowed
- APPLICATION: Guests will be asked to fill out an HOA application (at no charge) before their visit.
- BEACH GEAR: There is an outdoor storage closet shared with unit 504 next door with beach chairs, coolers, and umbrellas available for guest use. The key to the storage closet is provided in the condo
- You are vacationing in a residential area. Please be a good neighbor by keeping the noise to a respectful level during the day and night. Excessive and unreasonable noise can deprive neighbors of the peaceful enjoyment of their private property.Getting AroundIndian Rocks Beach is a very walkable neighborhood but there are bicycles and electric scooters available for rent in the area. The Suncoast Beach Trolley runs from Clearwater Beach (north) to Pass-A-Grille (south) and stops at specially marked "Trolley Stop" locations along the entire Gulf Blvd. Uber and Lyft are also available in the area.

Sunshine State at Custom House Inn | On.title: Sunshine State at Custom House Inn | On Duval!
Sunshine State at Custom House Inn | On.description:
Welcome to Sunshine at the Custom House Inn! Each apartment in our five unit complex is uniquely designed and themed to fit your fun stay. 
Modern, edgy and colorful, find comfort in our plush bedding and premier location in the heart of historic Duval Street. 
Surrounded by vibrant food and entertainment in a beautiful area, stay in one of newly designed suites echoing the rich history and culture of Key West. Spend your weekend away at this newly remodeled studio!The SpaceMade for your next Florida stay, Sunshine State boasts yellow accents and classy decor.
Bedroom: King size bed with attached full bathroom
Living Area: Queen size pullout couch and half bathroom

Inside the room you will find a cable TV, mini fridge and coffee maker at your own mini-bar. 
Socialize with neighbors on the turf balcony in the back with comfy sectional couches.Guest AccessOur contactless check-in procedure makes check-in easy. Guests will receive a personalized access code prior to arrival.

How to Access: First floor unitNeighborhoodOn the 100 block of Duval, The Custom House Inn is centralized to everything Key West. 
In the heart of Duval street you can find many of locals favorite's such as: the Worlds Smallest Bar, Fogartys, Irish Kevins, Mangoes, Moondog Cafe & The Hemingway House.

Looking for a night out? Find Willy T's, Rick’s Complex and Fat Tuesday’s just steps away, and don’t worry there are pedicabs everywhere for easy transportation up and down Duval Street.
Being in the heart of everything does come with noise of Duval street, but nonetheless an easy and convenient location to experience all Key West has to offerOther things to note- There is no washer/dryer on site. 
- No pets allowed. 
- Reserve this room along with four others at Custom House Inn for a group of up to 20 guests!
- For the purpose of creating a safe environment for our guests, the exterior of the building is monitored by security cameras.Getting AroundThere are a variety of great ways to explore Key West including by bicycle, pedi-cab, moke, scooter, golf cart, Uber, Taxi, or by feet. As this unit is located in downtown Key West, many attractions are within walking distance. Feel free to ask us for recommendations!

There is no on site parking for this unit. 
There are other overnight parking lots listed below:
• Fleming Street Pay-to-Park Lot (This is Closest to you!)
• 204 Simonton Street
• Caroline Street Outdoor Parking Lot
• Park N Ride Old Town Garage

Welcome to Key Haven Estates! The Crestwood is one of four newly designed homes on the exclusive island of Key Haven. This gated community offers private boat docking in our marina and luxurious homes with a tropical touch. Make the Crestwood House your sanctuary with a private pool, fire-pit, parking, and a pet-friendly gated yard. Experience the modern charm of these stunningly designed residences and enjoy ultimate Keys living.The SpaceImmerse yourself in the timeless allure of The Crestwood House where heritage and charm coexist. 

The sleeping arrangements of the home are as follows:
Bedroom 1: King bed with a walk-in closet, double vanity en-suite bathroom & balcony access
Bedroom 2: King bed with a walk-in closet, double vanity en-suite bathroom & balcony access
Bedroom 3: King bed with en-suite bathroom
Bedroom 4: King bed with en-suite bathroom and balcony 
Bedroom 5: Two twin over twin bunk beds, this room does not have a door
Bedroom 6: Double bed with en-suite bathroom 

The open-concept floor plan seamlessly connects the indoor and outdoor areas, making it perfect for entertaining and spending quality family time. Whether you're relaxing in the pool, playing a game of pool, grilling delicious meals, or simply relaxing in one of the multiple dining and seating areas, this home has everything you need to create lasting memories.

The fully equipped kitchen is ready to cater to your culinary desires, whether you prefer to cook your own meals or hire a private chef. Stay connected with high-speed internet access and enjoy the convenience of keyless entry, making your vacation experience even more seamless and hassle-free.

Outside, the spacious fenced-in turf yard provides a safe space for children to play, as well as a perfect area for your furry friends to roam around.Guest AccessGuests will receive a personalized access code prior to arrival and direct contact to a local guest experience manager for any questions, needs or recommendations during their stay.

Boating & Private Dock Slip:
We encourage boating. Here's what you need to know in order to do so safely:
- Dock in our exclusive marina which accommodate boats up to 40’ in length. Maximum one boat per slip.
- There is no power or pump out service to the slips.
- The Florida Keys are a notoriously difficult place to navigate.

How to Access: Stair access only the home is elevated above sea level.NeighborhoodAbout the Community:
The gated community is less than one mile from Key West and all of its famous attractions. Key Haven Estates is a family-style neighborhood. 

Boat Ramp:
There is a boat ramp directly across the street available for use.

Key Haven To-Dos:
There is a local park walking distance from the unit to spend time with your family and friends. 
Rent a boat for the day out of Stock Rock Café at Cow Key Marina and embrace island time!
Catch a kayak tour out of Lazy Dog in Stock Island.

Our Favorite Nearby Restaurant Recommendations:
Locals’ favorites Hogfish Grill, Roostica or Chicos Cantina. Take a trip to Hurricane Hole for happy hour or head downtown for some of the best seafood.

Ask your GEM for their favorite things-to-do and places-to-go!Other things to note- Private washer/dryer
- Located in gated communityGetting AroundTravel by car, boat, or plane to our luxury estate. The driveway allows parking for up to 3 vehicles and your boat trailer. 
If you didn’t travel by water, you can also drop your boat at one of the public boat ramps in Key Haven or Stock Island. 
Rent a golf cart, scooter, moke or bike for the day to explore the area. Feel free to ask us for recommendations!

SoHo Serenity by Brightwild | Pool & Hot.title: SoHo Serenity by Brightwild | Pool & Hot Tub
SoHo Serenity by Brightwild | Pool & Hot.description:
Nestled in the heart of SoHo, just one block from S Howard Ave, "SoHo Serenity" is the perfect spot to enjoy all that South Tampa has to offer. This incredible 3 bed, 3 bath home features a sun-filled outdoor area with a private pool, outdoor dining area, and poolside loungers. Stay in and enjoy a cup of coffee on your private patio or head out to explore the vibrant SoHo district, Hyde Park, Bayshore Blvd, or downtown Tampa!The SpaceThis single-story bungalow nestled in the SoHo community is just steps from S. Howard Ave, about 0.5 miles from Hyde Park and 1.5 miles from Bayshore Beautiful.  "SoHo Serenity" features an updated, fully-stocked kitchen and a total of three bedrooms and three bathrooms, ideal for your next Tampa Bay getaway! Sleeping up to 6 guests, this stunning unit has two king bedrooms in the main house and one queen-sized murphy bed in the rear poolside studio. There are two full bathrooms in the main house, one en suite and the other in the hallway, and a full en suite bathroom in the poolside suite.

The updated kitchen makes staying in a breeze! Featuring beautiful black granite countertops, a full-sized fridge, microwave, oven, stove top, cookware, and a Keurig coffee maker. Utilize the laundry room with your washer and dryer and complimentary laundry detergent, located in the main home between the back entrance and the kitchen. Enjoy free high-speed WiFi and smart TVs with access to YouTube TV and all your favorite streaming apps. Sit back, relax, and chill out in your own private outdoor space via the back door or through the gate by the driveway. 

Experience historic Hyde Park, the vibrant SoHo district, or world-famous Bern's Steakhouse - all just a short distance away! Are you an early riser? Head down to Bayshore Blvd and catch the breathtaking sunrises over Downtown Tampa every morning!Guest AccessGuests will receive a 6-digit access code that opens the rear pool studio and the back door of the main home, located on the deck next to the pool.NeighborhoodSouth Howard, or “SoHo”, is one of the most popular areas of Tampa featuring vibrant nightlife, and fun for everyone! Nestled in the heart of South Tampa and within walking distance of Bayshore Boulevard, this area is perfect for your next getaway. Bayshore Boulevard has 4.5 miles of scenic views and outdoor exercise equipment paralleling Tampa Bay. Historic Hyde Park Village is an outdoor shopping mall just a 15-minute walk away with dining, shopping, and various pop-up events! A variety of parks, Downtown Tampa, and the Tampa International Airport are all a 10-minute drive away or less!Other things to note- This is a non-smoking property. Smoking of any kind in the home will result in a $500 fine.
- Trash Info: Trash days are on Tuesday and Friday. Trash cans are located in the rear of the home, next to the private parking spaces. 
- Parking: This unit offers 2 private off-street parking spots behind the home, next to the rear pool studio.
- Pets: One pet per stay is allowed - we simply charge a $15 per day pet fee for your stay!
- The pool is serviced on Monday and Thursday.Getting AroundSoHo is a very walkable neighborhood but there are self-service bicycles available for rent on Bayshore Boulevard. There are also electric scooters for rent in the area via any of the scooter rental apps. (Bird, Uber, Lime, etc.)  If you are planning on exploring the Tampa Bay Area, there are many car rental storefronts at the airport and in the surrounding area! Tampa has a plethora of street parking, garage parking, and pay-by-app parking.

Classic King Balcony - at the James Hous.title: Classic King Balcony - at the James House
Classic King Balcony - at the James Hous.description:
- The historic James House sits on Caroline street, just one home away from Duval street and its coveted attractions, top-tier dining and nightlife.
- Included with your stay, across the street you can self-tour and enjoy the pool at the iconic Curry Mansion built in 1869. The mansion houses a collection of unique architectural details and historic pieces from the mansion's storied past. 
- The James House consists of 8 private rooms each with en-suite bathrooms, mini fridge and private balcony.The SpaceKing room with private bathroom and either a porch or balcony. 
In room amenities -  mini fridge, iron, ironing board & blow dryer.

Included with Your Stay - 24-hour coffee & water station, ice maker, toaster, microwave, concierge service through our on-the-ground and in-your-corner team, wi-fi and self-guided tours of the Mansion.Guest AccessOur contactless check-in makes the process seamless. Guests will receive a personalized access code before arrival as well as code to the front door code to the James House & Curry Mansion amenities. Guests will also have direct contact to a local guest experience manager for any questions, needs or recommendations during their stay.

Guests have use of the property all day for bathrooms, showers and pool access.NeighborhoodPlaced perfectly between downtown Key West and the Historic Seaport, enjoy walkable attractions like Fury Water Adventures for a day at sea, the Mel Fisher Maritime Museum for some Key West history and the famous Mallory Square for a Sunset Celebration. 

Steps from Duval Street, the Curry Mansion is steps away from Key West's most famous bars and kitchens. Food is at your fingertips with locals favorite restaurants, such as First Flight, Bagatelle and Two Friends Patio, less than a 5-minute walk from your front door. Got a sweet tooth? Keep an eye out for Kermit’s Key Lime Pie Shoppe known for the best key lime pie in Key West. Or, grab some homemade fudge and candy from River Street Sweets.

Forgot something or need a quick fix? Shorty’s Market has your last minute necessities for your weekend getaway. Just 2 blocks away, you will also find Fausto’s Food Market with locally sourced groceries.Other things to note- Please note room layout and decor may vary. If the room is located on the second floor, it is stair access only.
- Laundry facilities are shared - to get you started we supply detergent and dryer sheets.
- Pet friendlyGetting AroundThere is complimentary parking available on a first-come first-serve basis.

There are a variety of great ways to explore Key West whether it be by bicycle, pedi-cab, Moke, scooter, golf cart, Uber, taxi or foot. Being in the heart of downtown Key West, many attractions are within walking distance. Please note we can not guarantee parking, but feel free to ask us for recommendations!
amenities: Path to entrance lit at night

SoHo Suite by Brightwild | Steps to SoHo.description:
Welcome to the "SoHo Suite"! This hidden gem sits in the heart of the highly desirable SoHo neighborhood, putting you in the center of all Tampa Bay has to offer. This cozy 1 bed 1 bath apartment is perfect for up to 4 guests with a king bed in the bedroom and a queen sized pull out sofa in the main living area. Stay in and enjoy a cup of coffee in your private outdoor oasis or head out to explore the vibrant SoHo district, Hyde Park, or beautiful Bayshore Blvd!The SpaceThis recently updated home in the heart of Tampa’s SoHo District sleeps up to four guests with plenty of space inside and out to settle in! It features a king bedroom, a queen sleeper sofa in the living room as well as one full bathroom with ample storage for your group throughout. 

The upgraded kitchen features stainless steel appliances and all the utensils and cookware you need to create a homemade meal! We provide a Keurig coffee machine and complimentary coffee pods with sweeteners for your stay. Just inside the bathroom is the laundry closet with a washer/dryer machine and soap + dryer sheets. 

Step outside to your own private, fenced side yard with an outdoor dining table! Sit down, share a meal and soak up the beautiful Florida weather when you stay at the SoHo Suite.

Enjoy free high-speed WiFi and a smart TV in the living room and bedroom. They have access to YouTube TV and all your favorite streaming apps!Guest AccessGuests will receive a 6-digit access code that opens the front door to the home.NeighborhoodSouth Howard, or “SoHo”, is one of the most popular areas of Tampa featuring vibrant nightlife, and fun for everyone! Nestled in the heart of South Tampa and within walking distance of Bayshore Boulevard, this area is perfect for your next getaway. Bayshore Boulevard has 4.5 miles of scenic views and outdoor exercise equipment paralleling Tampa Bay. A variety of parks, Downtown Tampa and the Tampa International Airport are all a 10 minute drive away or less!Other things to note- Noise: Please be aware that this unit is in the heart of the SoHo district, there are many bars and restaurants on Howard Avenue that can generate extra noise over the weekends and during special events.
- This is a non-smoking property. Smoking of any kind in the home will result in a $500 fine.
- Trash Info: Trash days are on Tuesday and Friday. Trash cans are located on the left side of the home. 
- Parking: This unit offers 2 private off-street parking spots directly in front of the home. 
- Pets: One pet per stay is allowed - we simply charge a $15 per day pet fee for your stay!
- Please be cautious of the capped gas line right outside the side door into the private yard area. NEW! Atlantic Oasis | Heated Pool, Near.title: NEW! Atlantic Oasis | Heated Pool, Near Beach!
NEW! Atlantic Oasis | Heated Pool, Near.description:
Atlantic Oasis is a true Key West "Conch Style" townhome consisting of over 1900 sq. ft. of beautiful living space. The home sits just steps to bustling Higgs Beach, an expansive dog park, the White St. Pier, coffee shops and local favorite dining spots. Enjoy top-of-the-line finishings throughout such as stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, and granite countertops. The home's open floor plan, sun-filled balconies, heated pool & tropical pool deck all make for the perfect vacation spot!The SpaceAtlantic Oasis offers everything you need to ensure a comfortable and relaxing stay for your Key West getaway. Feel at home with modern appliances, a private heated pool, and off-street parking!

Bedroom 1 - King Bed, en-suite bathroom with double vanities, french doors leading to the private balcony overlooking the pool & desk for a great work from home setup. 
Bedroom 2 - King Bed, en-suite bath/shower, private balcony with quiet neighborhood views and a desk.
Bedroom 3 - Queen Bed - located on the first floor.

You can also find large, shaded balconies off of each bedroom upstairs.

This townhome is fully furnished & filled with all of your vacation essentials for your month-long stay in the keys. There is private parking included with your stay.Guest AccessOur self check-in makes the process seamless. 

Guests will receive a personalized access code prior to arrival and direct contact to a local guest experience manager for any questions, needs or recommendations during their stay.NeighborhoodThis two-story townhome sits on a quiet residential street in a quiet area of Key West known as "Mid-Town" and is located just 1 block from popular Higgs Beach, Salute Beach Bar, as well as volleyball, tennis, and pickle ball courts! You will also be just a 5 minute drive or 10 minute bike ride from Duval St and Key West's local attractions including bike paths, nightlife restaurants, and shopping.
Ask your GEM for their favorite things-to-do and places-to-go!Other things to note- Private stackable washer and dryer located on the second floor. To get you started, we supply detergent and dryer sheets.
- 28-night minimum
- This unit is pet friendly at an added cost.
- 25+ to rentGetting AroundThis unit includes parking for up to 2 cars in the driveway. There is also free street parking in front of the house that is accessible at anytime.

There are a variety of great ways to explore Key West including by bicycle, pedi-cab, moke, scooter, golf cart, Uber, Taxi, or by feet. Feel free to ask us for recommendations!

NEW! South Petite Room | Steps to the Be.title: NEW! South Petite Room | Steps to the Beach!
NEW! South Petite Room | Steps to the Be.description:
Welcome to the "South Petite" Room at Hotel Cabana! 

Hotel Cabana has a rich, multi-decade history. Originally built in 1947 as a single-story building and named Coca Cabana, our hotel has always been a haven for laid-back sun lovers to enjoy the beach in a warm and welcoming environment. We’ve always had a common goal: to welcome people to Clearwater Beach, one of the most beautiful places on earth. We hope to see you soon and again in years to come!The SpaceBoasting tropical-contemporary aesthetics, our petite studio is perfect for up to two guests looking to immerse themselves in a chic, Florida Keys-inspired atmosphere. Reflections 503 | OCEANFRONT, Pool, Hot.title: Reflections 503 | OCEANFRONT, Pool, Hot Tub
Reflections 503 | OCEANFRONT, Pool, Hot.description:
Welcome to "Reflections on the Gulf 503," a stunning waterfront retreat located in the charming beach town of Indian Rocks Beach! This 2-bed, 2-bath condo features unobstructed views of the Gulf of Mexico and breathtaking sunsets that will leave you in awe. With its prime location, luxurious amenities, and proximity to delicious dining, shops, and beach bars, this vacation rental is the perfect choice for your coastal getaway.The SpaceThe open-concept living area features comfy recliner chairs, and a Queen sleeper sofa, perfect for relaxing and enjoying the company of friends and family. The large flat-screen smart TV provides cable, surround sound, and access to your favorite streaming apps. The private balcony, complete with a screened-in enclosure, allows you to soak up the refreshing gulf breezes and gorgeous water views.

Reflections on the Gulf 503 comfortably accommodates up to 6 guests, with a King bed in the master bedroom, a Queen bed in the second bedroom, and a Queen sleeper sofa in the living area. Each bedroom is tastefully decorated and offers a peaceful retreat for a restful night's sleep. The en suite, master bathroom includes a double vanity, a walk-in closet with a safe, mirrored closet doors, and a private separate toilet and shower room. The spare bathroom is located just off the Queen bedroom, making it convenient for visitors and guests alike.

The fully equipped kitchen is a chef's delight, featuring modern appliances and all the necessary tools to prepare a delicious meal. However, if you prefer dining out, you'll find an array of amazing restaurants just a 5-minute drive away. Guppies, Sandy's, JD's Restaurant, Chicago Jax, The Paris Bakery, and Kokomo Tiki Bar are just a few of the fantastic options to satisfy your culinary cravings.

Indulge in the resort-like amenities offered at "Reflections on the Gulf." Take a refreshing dip in the sparkling pool, unwind in the relaxing hot tub, or challenge your friends to a game of tennis on the on-site court. When it's time to hit the beach, you'll appreciate the direct beach access, allowing you to sink your toes in the sand and soak up the Florida sunshine. There are even coolers, beach chairs, and umbrellas for you to use!

The owners of "Reflections on the Gulf 503" sincerely hope that you will love their property as much as they do. They invite you to relax on the balcony, where you can witness the breathtaking sunsets and gaze at the moon and stars, creating the perfect end to each day of your vacation. Don't miss out on this unforgettable beachfront experience—book your stay today and make lasting memories at Indian Rocks Beach!Guest AccessGuests will receive a 6-digit access code that opens the door to the unit. Guests will also receive a physical key to the building via a lockbox outside the front entrance to the condominium building.

Guests will have access to 1 designated parking spot labeled "503." For guests with multiple vehicles, there is additional parking on site on a first-come, first-serve basis for any spots that start with the number 12.

Guests will also have access to the following:
- luggage carts and grocery carts located in the lobby
- Beach chairs, coolers, and beach and umbrellas in the storage closet located down the hall from the condo
- Heated Pool
- Sundeck
- Tennis courts
- Hot tub
- The beach can be accessed by the trail behind the property.NeighborhoodIndian Rocks Beach offers a laid-back atmosphere, perfect for those seeking a peaceful beach retreat. However, if you're craving more excitement, bustling Clearwater Beach is only a 15-minute drive to the north, while St. Pete Beach is just a 30-minute drive to the south. Explore waterfront dining and a vibrant nightlife scene in these popular destinations.Other things to note- This unit has a 14-night minimum, with no exceptions.
- This unit requires a Saturday check-in and Saturday check-out from late December through April.
- Please note that there is minor construction being performed on the exterior of the building, however, little noise will be heard from guests staying in this unit.
- SMOKING: Smoking is strictly prohibited in the unity and on the property grounds. Smoking will result in a $500 fine.
- PETS: Sorry, no pets allowed
- APPLICATION: Guests will be asked to fill out an HOA application (at no charge) before their visit.
- BEACH GEAR: There is an outdoor storage closet shared with unit 504 next door with beach chairs, coolers, and umbrellas available for guest use. The key to the storage closet is provided in the condo
- You are vacationing in a residential area. Please be a good neighbor by keeping the noise to a respectful level during the day and night. Excessive and unreasonable noise can deprive neighbors of the peaceful enjoyment of their private propertyGetting AroundIndian Rocks Beach is a very walkable neighborhood but there are bicycles and electric scooters available for rent in the area. The Suncoast Beach Trolley runs from Clearwater Beach (north) to Pass-A-Grille (south) and stops at specially marked "Trolley Stop" locations along the entire Gulf Blvd. Uber and Lyft are also available in the area.

Whether you're seeking a romantic getaway, a solo adventure, or a beachside escape with friends, this condo is the perfect home base. Located on Clearwater Beach Hotel Cabana is in a vibrant and popular neighborhood.

NEW! Canopy Cabana | Luxury Downtown Apt.title: NEW! Canopy Cabana | Luxury Downtown Apt
NEW! Canopy Cabana | Luxury Downtown Apt.description:
Welcome to "Canopy Cabana," located in the newly constructed Canopy Apartments complex in the heart of downtown Safety Harbor! This beautifully updated 2-bed, 2-bath luxury apartment offers all new furniture and top-of-the-line amenities, ensuring the utmost comfort for the entirety of your stay. Immerse yourself in the vibrant local scene, as you'll be within walking distance to an array of fantastic restaurants, shops, a rejuvenating spa, and serene waterfront nature trails.The SpaceThis first floor apartment's interior boasts modern decor with subtle touches of old-Florida style. Recently updated and newly furnished, "Canopy Cabana" offers everything you need to make this the perfect "home away from home" during your stay in Safety Harbor.
 
Accommodations include 1 King bedroom and 1 Queen bedroom, both with comfy beds, ceiling fans, walk-in closets, and bedside charging ports for your electronic devices.  The King bedroom offers a spacious ensuite bath with a double vanity and beautiful walk-in shower with a glass door.  The Queen bedroom sits just down the hall from the second full bathroom. 

The modern "chef's" kitchen features stainless steel appliances, an island with stool seating, a Kuerig coffee maker with complimentary coffee supplies, and comes fully stocked with cookware, providing everything you need to cook up a delicious meal for your group. Enjoy the convenience of a private washer and dryer with complimentary detergent pods and dryer sheets, ensuring a stress-free stay. 

Entertainment is at your fingertips with premium cable, free WiFi, and a large flat screen smart TV in the living room for your leisure. Plus, "Canopy Cabana's" proximity to Main Street and the bustling downtown area means you're just steps away from all the action.

For nature enthusiasts, the condo is perfectly placed, offering easy access to Safety Harbor Park and Nature and Boardwalk. When you're ready for some beach time, the world-famous Clearwater Beach is a mere 25-minute drive away.

Indulge in a delightful vacation experience, combining the tranquility of Safety Harbor with the excitement of downtown living. Book your stay now and make memories in this stylish and conveniently located condo.

SMOKING: please be aware that Canopy Apartments is a smoke free "campus." Smoking inside the unit, on the front porch, or anywhere on the property is prohibited and may result in a fine of up to $500. If needed, there are designated smoking areas in the park across the street.Guest AccessGuests will receive a 6-digit access code to enter the unit.NeighborhoodSafety Harbor is a quaint waterfront town boasting rich history and a sense of community that truly makes it feel like a home away from home. The downtown area features several different outdoor parks, a waterfront pier and is home to the original "Fountain of Youth" at the Safety Harbor Resort and Spa! There are also fantastic restaurants and local shops on Main Street just steps away from your front door. We recommend Haven House for breakfast and the Sandwich on Main for lunch!Other things to noteSMOKING: please be aware that Canopy Apartments is a smoke free "campus." Smoking inside the unit, on the front porch, or anywhere on the property is prohibited and may result in a fine of up to $500. If needed, there are designated smoking areas in the park across the street.
- Pets: sorry, no pets allowed
- Parking: there is no designated parking, however, there are ample off street parking spots both by your front door and in the lot behind the building.Getting AroundSafety Harbor is a very pedestrian friendly area with plenty of nature trails as well as shopping and restaurants all along the downtown waterfront area for you to explore! There are also bicycle, scooter and car services available to reserve via app (Uber, Lyft, Etc.) to get around during your stay.

Custom House Inn | Two Suites On Duval S.title: Custom House Inn | Two Suites On Duval St
Custom House Inn | Two Suites On Duval S.description:
Located right in the heart of the World Famous Duval Street, enjoy a true downtown Key West experience at the one-of-a-kind Custom House Inn! The 1st Floor Condos offer a central convenient location to Key West’s main attractions and everything else the Southernmost city has to offer. Sleeping up to 8 guests both newly designed apartments are built for a comfy, modern and colorful stay.The SpaceEach picturesque room is perfectly designed to maximize the space, provide a place to work remote and cozy into bed after a long day on the town.
 
The sleeping arrangements for up to 8 guests are as follows: 
Condo 1 - a calming blue spacious studio with a King Bed & Queen Pullout Couch
Condo 2- a relaxing green studio suite with a King Bed & Queen Pullout Couch

Inside each room you will find a private mini-bar with cable TV, mini fridge and coffee maker. You will also find a large rooftop deck with sectional sofas and a turf floor.Guest AccessOur contactless check-in procedure makes check-in easy. Guests will receive a personalized access code prior to arrival.

How to Access: Both studios are located on the first floorNeighborhoodOn the 100 block of Duval, The Custom House Inn is centralized to everything Key West. 
In the heart of Duval street you can find many of locals favorite's such as: the Worlds Smallest Bar, Fogartys, Irish Kevins, Mangoes, Moondog Cafe & The Hemingway House.

Looking for a night out? Find Willy T's, Rick’s Complex and Fat Tuesday’s just steps away and don’t worry there are pedicabs everywhere for easy transportation up and down Duval Street.
Being in the heart of everything does come with noise of Duval street, but nonetheless an easy and convenient location to experience all Key West has to offer!Other things to note- There is no washer/dryer on site. 
- No pets allowed. 
- Reserve the entire property or each individual unit known as, Chicken Run, Citrus Queen, Birds of a Feather, Underwater Cabana & Sunshine State.
- For the purpose of creating a safe environment for our guests, the exterior of the building is monitored by security cameras.Getting AroundThere are a variety of great ways to explore Key West including by bicycle, pedi-cab, moke, scooter, golf cart, Uber, Taxi, or by feet. As this unit is located in downtown Key West, many attractions are within walking distance. Feel free to ask us for recommendations!

NEW! St Pete Retreat | Newly Updated, Pe.title: NEW! St Pete Retreat | Newly Updated, Pet Friendly
NEW! St Pete Retreat | Newly Updated, Pe.description:
Get away and settle into this newly renovated home in the heart of St.Petersburg! With Two Bedrooms, Two Bathrooms, and ample outdoor space, this is the perfect home base for up to four guests. Curate a meal in your own upgraded, stainless steel kitchen, or cozy up and watch your favorite shows on your HD Smart TV!The SpaceThis home is the perfect St. Pete getaway for up to four guests! The space features one queen bedroom, one twin-to-king bedroom, and two full bathrooms for you to make yourself at home. Each bathroom is stocked with towels + complimentary toiletries and each bedroom is finished with fresh linens for your stay. 

 The fully upgraded kitchen features brand-new appliances including a Fridge, Oven, Microwave and Dishwasher as well as dining space for the whole group. It is also fully stocked with cooking supplies to make cooking and eating easy! Work from home in the tastefully designed front foyer or lounge out and enjoy a movie on your HD Smart TV in the spacious living area.

There is a full-sized washer and dryer located in the rear garage, just outside the back door of the home. We have also included complimentary laundry soap + dryer sheets in the laundry area for your stay as well.Guest AccessGuests will receive a 6-digit access code that opens the door to home.NeighborhoodSt. Petersburg is a bustling city with rich history, plenty of outdoor parks and incredible restaurants + shopping for you to take advantage of during your stay with us! Downtown St. Petersburg is a 10-15 minute drive away and features a stunning waterfront pier as well as dining and local stores all along Central Avenue for you to explore. Some of our favorite places to visit in the area are the Sunken Gardens, the Dali Museum and Pier Teaki!Other things to note- PETS: 1 pet per unit. $15/day fee
- SMOKING: Smoking is strictly prohibited in the unit and on the property grounds. Smoking will result in a $500 fine
- LAUNDRY: Private washer and dryer as well as laundry soaps available for guestsGetting AroundSt. Petersburg offers various forms of public transport to make exploring the city a breeze! The Downtown Looper and Central Avenue Trolley are free bus/trolley services that run in downtown St. Petersburg, the Sunrunner bus service runs from downtown St. Pete to the beaches! Additionally, there are E-Scooters, bike share, and ride share services throughout the city.

NEW! Casa Monte Cristo - Upscale Ybor To.title: NEW! Casa Monte Cristo - Upscale Ybor Townhome
NEW! Casa Monte Cristo - Upscale Ybor To.description:
The newly constructed, professionally decorated "Casa Monte Cristo" is the perfect luxury home for you and your group to explore historic Ybor City. This 3-story townhome offers 2 Queen BRs on the ground floor and a King BR on the 2nd floor Master Suite. Head upstairs and enjoy the privacy of your rooftop sun deck, which provides plenty of seating and unobstructed city skyline views. Located on a quiet street, the home sits just 3 blocks from 7th Ave and a trolley ride away from Sparkman Wharf.The SpaceWith modern and chic decor throughout the interior, come experience a truly magnificent vacation rental with all the comforts of home - and then some! 

The spacious living area offers a huge flat-screen Smart TV with Sonos surround sound that you can control from your phone. 

Just off the living room, you can utilize the fabulous kitchen - truly a chef's dream. The kitchen comes equipped with top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances, a Keurig coffee station, an ice-maker, gas stove, a wall-mounted pot filler faucet, and everything else from champagne glasses to pizza cutters!

The Queen bedrooms are located on the 1st floor of the home and share a full bathroom, directly next to the laundry room. Head up to the 2nd floor and you will find a lavish Master Bedroom with a plush King bed, large flat screen TV, bedside lighting, full-length mirror, tons of closet space, and en suite bathroom. 

On the top floor lies the stylish lounge area with a flat-screen Smart TV, a wet bar, and a mini fridge - the perfect place to enjoy at-home entertainment with friends or to catch up on some much-needed R & R. Just off the 3rd-floor lounge lies your very own private sundeck, where you can take in amazing views of the downtown Tampa skyline and the surrounding neighborhood.Guest AccessGuests will receive a 6-digit access code that opens the rear entrance.NeighborhoodFounded in the 1880s, the Historic Ybor City district is well known for its eclectic collection of culture and countless cigar factories for which the city was named, for Don Vincent Martinez Ybor. Take a stroll down the original red brick streets and step into a piece of history. Indulge in a comedy show at The Improv, Eat at the historic Columbia Restaurant, or explore the local shops, bars, and artisans that make the Ybor community so rich.Other things to note- Please note this property has 2 exterior security cameras located at the front of the home and the rear of the home.
- This is a non-smoking property. Smoking of any kind in the interior of the home will result in a $500 fine.
- Trash Info: Trash days are on Tuesday and Friday. Trash cans are located by the street in the front of the home.
- Pets: Pets are allowed, 50 lb maximum. $15 per day per pet - 2 pets maximum.
- Parking: This unit offers 1 private off-street parking spot in the rear of the home. There is also street parking in front of the home. You will need to send us your vehicle info upon booking this property for us to register your vehicle for free street parking.Getting AroundYbor is a very walkable neighborhood however, there are also self-service bicycles and electric scooters available for rent in the area via any of the scooter rental apps. (Bird, Uber, Lime, etc.)  If you are planning on exploring the Tampa Bay Area, there are many car rental storefronts at the airport and in the surrounding area! Tampa has a plethora of street parking, garage parking, and pay-by-app parking.

Akoya House at The Gemma by Brightwild.title: Akoya House at The Gemma by Brightwild
Akoya House at The Gemma by Brightwild.description:
Just steps away from the quartz white sand of Clearwater Beach sits a brand new collection of homes – for your weekend away or an extended stay on the Gulf Coast. With spacious layouts and modern amenities & upscale furnishings "The Gemma" vacation homes provide a haven for travelers seeking the ultimate beachfront experience. Whether you're savoring your morning coffee on a private balcony, basking in the Florida sun by the pool, or strolling along the powdery white sands of Clearwater Beach, "The Gemma" ensures that your vacation dreams become a reality.The SpaceExperience the calming atmosphere of Akoya House. This simple coastal retreat has a clean and natural design, providing a peaceful escape for relaxation.

This expansive 6-bedroom estate embodies all your desires, featuring an elevator, both outdoor and indoor living rooms equipped with smart TVs, a luxurious hot tub, a private pool surrounded by sun loungers, and an outdoor half bathroom for added convenience.

Bedroom 1 - Second level King Room with double vanity, walk-in shower & balcony
Bedroom 2 - Second level King Room with double vanity, bathtub & balcony
Bedroom 3 - Third level King Room with double vanity, walk-in shower & balcony
Bedroom 4 - Third level King Room with double vanity, walk-in shower & balcony
Bedroom 5 - Third level Queen Bunk Room with double vanity & walk-in shower
Bedroom 6 - Third level King Room with double vanity & walk-in shower

Here, you'll find spacious living areas, a gourmet kitchen, and a private patio to enjoy the gentle Gulf breezes.Guest AccessGuests will receive a personalized access code prior to arrival and direct contact to a local guest experience manager for any questions, needs or recommendations during their stay.NeighborhoodThe Gemma is located steps from the beach. Clearwater Beach offers a vibrant atmosphere with plenty of dining, shopping, and entertainment options. From water sports to sunset strolls along the sugar-white sands, you'll find endless activities to enjoy.

Just steps away from the quartz white sand of Clearwater Beach sits a brand new collection of homes – for your weekend away or an extended stay on the Gulf Coast.
