Loggerhead Lagoon | Canalfront, Tiki Hut.title: Loggerhead Lagoon | Canalfront, Tiki Hut & Dock!
Loggerhead Lagoon | Canalfront, Tiki Hut.description:
Loggerhead Lagoon is a stunning, tropically themed, 3-bed 2-bath home located on a large private lot that offers covered parking, a boat dock, and direct access to the Gulf of Mexico.

This rare find boasts a lush outdoor area, full of beautiful palms, sun loungers, and tons of FL sunshine! Located in Sugarloaf Key, you are only a 40 minute drive to Key West and world famous Duval Street. 

Looking to unwind? You won't find a better option for your month-long (or more) stay in paradiseThe SpaceSpread out and spend quality family time in the open floor plan interior. Highlights of this modern home include tall vaulted ceilings, high-end finishings, tile floors, impact windows, sliding glass doors & a walk-in laundry room. 

Cook homemade meals in the kitchen with stainless steel appliances and custom cabinetry to maximize space.

Bedroom 1 - Master king with en-suite bathroom 
Bedroom 2 - Queen bed, filled with natural light & closet space
Bedroom 3 - Queen size bed, spacious, closet space
Extra Sleeping - Queen sleeper sofa for extra guests joining!

Relax on the roomy porch perfect for entertaining guests and late night stargazing. 
Perfect for anyone looking for a month-long getaway that wants to enjoy the true benefits of staying in a waterfront island retreat in the lower Keys!Guest AccessGuest will receive an access code for the lock box to retrieve the house key upon arrival. . 

How to access: Stair access onlyNeighborhoodLoggerhead Lagoon is located on Sugarloaf Key just 20 minutes from Key West - find this private oasis right off of US 1 & Krane Boulevard. 
Check out our favorite must do's & eats all within 5 minutes from your front door - 
Looking for a day away? Check out Sugarloaf Lodge where you can travel by boat to the South of Seven Restaurant & Marina.
Book a day on the water - local fishing & eco tours available, kayaking, paddle boarding, snorkeling & more!
Looking for an adventure? Take the trip of a life time at Sky Dive Key West
Eat at locals favorites - Square Grouper & My New Joint
Coffee is a must on vacation check out Morning Joint & Baby's Coffee for a morning brew!Other things to note- Private washer/dryer in home.
- Parking Information: Off-street covered parking for 2 vehicles.
- This home is pet friendly!
- All advertising should reflect a 28-day minimum stay requirement and monthly rates for rental or lease. All rentals should be for 28+ consecutive days and to the same tenant. It is unlawful for any landlord, tenant, agent, or other representatives to rent, lease, advertise or offer for rent any dwelling unit for vacation rental use in any district where vacation rental use (less than 28 days) is prohibited.Getting AroundTravel by water or foot at this waterfront property! Boat docking available in the back of the home along with private vehicle parking.

NEW! Treasure Trove | One-of-a-Kind Key.title: NEW! Treasure Trove | One-of-a-Kind Key West Loft
NEW! Treasure Trove | One-of-a-Kind Key.description:
Dating back to 1919, Casa Antigua has a rich history as a one-of-a-kind property in downtown Key West. As one of Key West's first hotels, Trev-Mor, this historic property used to house 46 rooms, a jazz club, and guests as elite as Ernest Hemingway. Ernest himself would say that this property is the reason he fell in love with Key West - with views of the seaport, walking distance to Mallory Square, and Sloppy Joe's just steps from his front door.The SpaceNow known as Casa Antigua, referring to "old house" in Spanish, the third-floor studio ensures an unparalleled experience for your month-long stay. Now transformed into a three-story interior atrium, surrounded by lush tropical greenery and a pool, we can ensure this property is unforgettable.

Flooded with natural light, the entryway and desk area provide a private space for your work-from-home set up.

Cozy into the king-sized bed surrounded by exposed brick and floor-to-ceiling windows, with blackout curtains. The modern bathroom features a double vanity, walk-in shower, and deep jacuzzi tub, offering a perfect retreat for relaxation and unwinding.

Unwind on the sectional couch in the open-concept living space, play a tune on the historic piano or cook a meal in the built-in kitchen equipped with top-of-the-line appliances. The distinctive row boat island countertop provides a one-of-a-kind touch to the dining space.Guest AccessOur contactless check-in procedure makes check-in easy. Guest will receive a personalized access code prior to arrival.NeighborhoodTreasure Trove is located in the heart of Key West's action, with plenty of dining and entertainment within walking distance, including historic Duval Street. Stroll a few blocks north to the docks, where snorkeling, boating, and other aquatic adventures await you.

Half a block from Duval Street, this spacious studio is just steps away from Key West's most famous bars and dining spots. Locals' favorite restaurants, such as First Flight, Bagatelle and Two Friend’s patio are less than a 5 minute walk from your front door. Got a sweet tooth? Keep an eye out for Kermit’s Key Lime Pie Shop in the Historic Seaport known for the best Key Lime Pie in Key West, or grab some homemade fudge and candy from River Street Sweets.

Forgot something, or need a quick fix? Shorty’s Market has your last minute necessities for your weekend getaway. Just 2 blocks away you can also find Fausto’s food market for locally sourced groceries.Other things to note- Convenient shared laundry facilities add to the practicality of your stay.
- 3rd floor unit with stair access only.
- This property is not pet friendly.Getting AroundThere are a variety of great ways to explore Key West including by bicycle, scooter, golf cart, Uber, Taxi, or by feet. As this unit is located in downtown Key West, many attractions are within walking distance. Feel free to ask us for overnight parking recommendations!

Sunset Beach Retreat by Brightwild | Nea.title: Sunset Beach Retreat by Brightwild | Near Caddy's!
Sunset Beach Retreat by Brightwild | Nea.description:
Steps from the pristine Sunset Beach and in the heart of the world famous Treasure Island awaits "Sunset Beach Retreat" - the ideal beach town getaway for you and your group to enjoy! This 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom beach-themed home features an outdoor entertainment lounge, spacious living area, formal dining room, covered parking for up to 4 vehicles, a total of 9 beds, and is pet friendly!The SpaceWith three levels, four bedrooms and three bathrooms this epic beach themed house is the ideal home base for groups looking for fun in the sun!

The first floor features front door to access the home, 2 private off-street parking spots and an outdoor entertainment space with lounge furniture, large flat screen TV, fenced yard, and fire pit. 

The second floor of the home is the pinnacle of living and dining! The large, sunlit living room features plenty of seating and a Smart TV for you to log in to all your favorite streaming apps. On the opposite side is the open-concept kitchen complete with a large dining table, cooking supplies, laundry room and a wine fridge! This floor contains one bedroom with a Queen bed, flat screen Smart TV and one full bathroom with a walk-in shower as well. 

The top-level features three bedrooms, two full bathrooms stocked with complimentary toiletries, and a spacious loft area which is perfect for congregating or getting ready for a night out! The spacious master bedroom includes a King bed, walk-in closet, and ensuite bath with a double vanity. The other 2 upstairs bedrooms include a bunk room with 2 "full over twin" bunk beds and a room with a King bed. The upstairs lounge features a flat screen TV, twin daybed, and plenty of seating for your group to socialize.

Ready to explore? The owner of the home has included 2 complimentary bicycles for guests to enjoy during their stay! Beach access to Sunset Beach - one of the most popular beaches in the nation - is just a few short blocks away, as well as world famous Caddy's Beach Bar & Grill. No need to bring beach towels, we got you covered!Guest AccessGuests will receive a 6-digit access code that opens the front entrance to the unit.NeighborhoodTreasure Island is a lively beach community adorned with waterfront dining, local shops and plenty of activities for your time in town! The beaches are wider in this area giving you and your guests plenty of space to spread out and soak up the 345 days of sunshine we get a year. In addition to the white sandy beaches, this area also features a nature trail and designated fishing areas to make the most of the Florida coast. Some of our favorite spots in Treasure Island are Ka'tiki, Caddy's on the Beach and Seadog Brewing Co.Other things to note- PARKING: there are 2 private covered parking spots located underneath the home. Each driveway can hold up to 2 cars, depending on the length of the vehicles.
- PETS: pets are allowed, pet fee is $15 per pet, per night.
- SMOKING: smoking is strictly prohibited in the unit and on the property grounds. Smoking will result in a $500 fine.
- WASHER & DRYER:  there are laundry machines + complimentary detergent pods and dryer sheets provided for your stay, the washer and dryer are located in the laundry room off the kitchen on the second level of the home.
- NOISE: please note that this home is in a quiet residential neighborhood. Noise needs to be kept at minimum between 10 PM and 8 AMGetting AroundTreasure Island is a very walkable beach neighborhood, however there are bicycles and electric scooters available for rent in the area! The Suncoast Beach Trolley runs from Clearwater Beach (north) to Pass-A-Grille (south), and stops at specially marked "Trolley Stop" locations along the entire Gulf Blvd. There are also car services such as Taxis, Uber and Lyft available in the area.

NEW! Mini Sky Suite - Gorgeous SPB Apt.title: NEW! Mini Sky Suite - Gorgeous SPB Apt
NEW! Mini Sky Suite - Gorgeous SPB Apt.description:
Welcome to the Mini Sky Suite - a stunning 1-bed, 1-bath apartment located right on the northern edge of the bustling town of St Pete Beach. Recently renovated, this monthly rental (30 night minimum) features 1 comfy King bed, a kitchenette with a fridge & microwave, 2 flat screen TVs, and a work station - perfect for remote workers or those looking for a healthy mix of business & pleasure.The SpaceAs the name suggests,"Mini" Sky Suite is smaller than your average 1-bed, 1-bath apartment. However, this updated rental offers everything you need to make your stay in St Pete Beach a comfortable one. 

The open-concept living room/kitchenette areas provide a comfy L-shaped leather sofa, a designated workstation with a desk chair and filing cabinet, a kitchenette with granite countertops, a full-sized bathroom, and a flat-screen smart TV.

The kitchenette comes with a refrigerator, freezer, Keurig coffee maker with complimentary coffee supplies, microwave, sink, and tons of cabinet space to store your snacks. The King bedroom offers a comfy King bed, flat screen smart TV, closet, full-length mirror, and 5-drawer dresser. Both rooms come equipped with ultra-quiet split-unit ACs and ceiling fans, allowing you to stay cool no matter the temperature outside.

The outdoor common area is a beachgoer's dream and includes 2 shaded outdoor dining tables, 2 hammocks, a gas grill, a shared (free) washer & dryer, an outdoor shower, and even corn-hole equipment!Guest AccessGuests will have access to the furnished outdoor common area, complete with a shared washer & dryer, gas grill, corn-hole, outdoor shower, 2 hammocks, and plenty of space to relax in the Florida sunshine.

Guests will receive a 6-digit access code to enter the home.NeighborhoodSt Pete Beach is an extraordinarily popular beach town and is consistently voted one of the top 1% beaches in the country year after year. The neighborhood and St Pete Beach in general are very pedestrian-friendly and offer an array of restaurants, beach bars, shops, and activities - many within walking distance of your rental. Some of our team's favorite local spots are the Toasted Monkey, Postcard Inn on the Beach, and Coconut Charlie's!Other things to note- PARKING: please note that there is no on-site parking at this unit. There is paid street parking only.
- PETS: non-aggressive pets are welcome. Pet fee of $150 per pet will be charged.
- SMOKING: smoking is strictly prohibited in the unit and on the property grounds. Smoking will result in a $500 fine.
- WASHER & DRYER:  this unit does not have a private washer or dryer. There is a shared washer & dryer in the outdoor common area that you can use free of charge.
- KITCHENETTE: there is no stove, range, or dishwasher in the kitchenette. Guests will be provided with plenty of dish soap for washing dishes as needed.Getting AroundMini Sky Suite is located in a very walkable neighborhood and guests who frequent this location can typically find everything they need within a 20-minute walk. There are plenty of restaurants, beach bars, shops, pharmacies, and convenience stores within walking distance of your rental home. Bicycle rentals are available nearby and might be a good idea since there is only paid street parking available for vehicles. The nearest beach access is about a 10-minute walk away.

The Delaney House by Brightwild - Privat.description:
Step into the classic conch cottage known as the Delaney House, situated just half a block from Duval Street. 
This three-bedroom, 3.5-bath home is ideal for groups of up to 6 people. It boasts a private pool in the backyard, perfect for leisurely dips, along with outdoor dining, a grill, and a street-front porch with rocking chairs, creating an ideal spot for savoring your morning brew.The SpaceThe house exudes a warm ambiance designed with classic Key West decor and imagery. Bay doors lead to the back pool deck, allowing ample natural light to create an authentic Florida atmosphere.
The sleeping arrangements are as follows:
Bedroom 1: King bed with a mini-fridge, coffee maker, private entry porch doors, and a double vanity bathroom.
Bedroom 2: Queen bed with a dedicated desk for remote work, an en-suite bathroom, and a double vanity.
Bedroom 3: Located off the kitchen, this room includes a double bed, desk, and a private bathroom.

Whether you're inclined to grill outdoors or prepare the day's fresh catch, the kitchen, conveniently situated just off the pool and deck for dining, offers an ideal setting. Complete with a full-size washer/dryer and accommodations for your furry friends, this pet-friendly rental is nestled in a walkable neighborhood with close proximity to all things Key West.Guest AccessAccess code will be provided to the guest prior to check in.NeighborhoodCloser to the southern end of Duval street this home is just steps away from the Key West Lighthouse and Hemingway Home and Museum. One block away from locals' favorite boozy brunch spots like Moondog Cafe, Rams Head Southernmost, and Blue Heaven, food is at your fingertips. Or stroll right down the street to Sushi Song for fresh catches or fast-casual burrito bowls from Sinz. Needless to say, this property is in the center of all-thing Key West and more.Other things to note- With guest comfort and care at the top of our priority list, this property is currently undergoing renovations for Summer 2024 (photos may vary).
- Private Washer/Dryer.
- There is 1 private parking spot included with your stay - it is located on the right side of the house.Getting AroundParking Information: Off-street parking for 1 vehicle is included - please note it is tight and meant for smaller vehicles. For additional parking we are happy to provide you with nearby recommendations! 

Take a short drive, stroll, or bike ride to explore Key West's most famous attractions, making the Delaney House an excellent hub for an unforgettable vacation experience. Feel free to ask us for recommendations!

Windsor Cottage | Quaint Old Town Home.title: Windsor Cottage | Quaint Old Town Home
Windsor Cottage | Quaint Old Town Home.description:
Perfectly located in the heart of Old Town, this contemporary cottage offers an ideal and central location. Newly constructed, the private home boasts two bedrooms and two full bathrooms, making it a spacious and comfortable choice for two couples or a family seeking a month-long retreat in the heart of Key West.The SpaceEnter through the private gated entrance into the serene patio and deck area—ideal for entertaining or unwinding after a day in town.

Bathed in natural light and outfitted with stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, and vaulted ceilings, the open-concept living space is thoughtfully designed for both spatial efficiency and quality family time.

Bedroom 1 features a Queen bed, a TV, an en-suite bathroom, and a double vanity with a walk-in shower. Bedroom 2 is equipped with a Queen bed and is conveniently located next to the second full bathroom, complete with a bath/shower combo. The living area also features a queen size pullout couch for extra guests joining.

Grill today's catch on the private BBQ grill, relax in the comfort of air conditioning, or bask in the Florida sun on the secluded patio. Explore Key West's attractions on foot, by bike, or by car from this charming hidden conch home.Guest AccessOur check-in makes process is seamless & our local team is here to help every step of the way. 

Guests will receive a personalized access code prior to arrival and direct contact to a local guest experience manager for any questions, needs or recommendations during their stay.NeighborhoodLocated right in the middle of Old Town Key West and off of a quiet one-way street in a residential neighborhood. Great bikeable location. 

Just two blocks from Duval street where you will be placed on the 600 block.

Nearby Restaurants: Mangia Mangia, Onlywood Pizzeria, Miso Happy 

Walking distance to famous bars, nightlife, and Key West Landmarks!Other things to note- 28-night minimum summer rental only
- Private washer/dryerGetting AroundThere is no parking included with your stay - feel free to ask us for recommendations!

There are a variety of great ways to explore Key West including by bicycle, pedi-cab, moke, scooter, golf cart, Uber, Taxi or by feet. This unit is located in downtown Key West and many attractions are within walking distance.

Heron House by Brightwild | Luxury Water.title: Heron House by Brightwild | Luxury Waterfront Home
Heron House by Brightwild | Luxury Water.description:
Beautifully renovated canal home located just outside Key West in an exclusive Key Haven neighborhood. This 28-night luxury residence boasts private boat docking, designer kitchen, and baths featuring marble countertops, stainless appliances, and ample storage. Enjoy light-filled living spaces, including a formal living room, family room, and a spacious kitchen with waterfront dining views. This property offers a perfect blend of comfort and elegance and is rental-ready for your next vacation!The SpaceThe inviting and open-concept living space maximize family time & plenty of places to relax. Family meals can be enjoyed around the kitchen table for up to 8 or outside on the waterfront deck barbecuing around the grill.

"The Green Room" -  Master bedroom with canal views, an ensuite bath, and a large walk-in closet, suitable for a pack n' play.
"The Pink Room" -  Sleeping 2-3 guests the large bedroom offers a private entrance, full bathroom, a full bed & twin trundle
"The Blue Room" - Queen bedroom with natural sunlight, bookshelf & closet space

Additional features include a private boat dock, covered lanai, hot tub, bricked patio, tropical landscaping, and a seawall. Don't miss this amazing waterfront property!Guest AccessGuests will receive a personalized access code prior to arrival and direct contact to a local guest experience manager for any questions, needs or recommendations during their stay.

Boating & Private Dock Slip:
We encourage boating. Here's what you need to know in order to do so safely:
- This waterfront lot offers docking up to 25'
- There is no power or pump out service to the slips.
- The Florida Keys are a notoriously difficult place to navigate.NeighborhoodLocated less than one mile from Key West and all of its famous attractions in a family-style neighborhood. 

Key Haven To-Dos:
There is a local park walking distance from the unit to spend time with your family and friends. 
Rent a boat for the day out of Stock Rock Café at Cow Key Marina and embrace island time!
Catch a kayak tour out of Lazy Dog in Stock Island.

Our Favorite Nearby Restaurant Recommendations:
Locals’ favorites Hogfish Grill, Roostica or Chicos Cantina. Take a trip to Hurricane Hole for happy hour or head downtown for some of the best seafood.

Ask your GEM for their favorite things-to-do and places-to-go!Other things to note- Private washer/dryer
- 28-night minimum
- Pets are welcome! $30 lbs maximum, 1 pet maximum, $15/nightGetting AroundTravel by car, boat, or plane to our luxury estate. The driveway allows parking for up to 2 vehicles.
If you didn’t travel by water, you can also drop your boat at one of the public boat ramps in Key Haven or Stock Island. 
Rent a golf cart, scooter, moke or bike for the day to explore the area. Feel free to ask us for recommendations!

NEW! Sangria Suite | Upscale Ybor Apt On.title: NEW! Sangria Suite | Upscale Ybor Apt On 7th Ave
NEW! Sangria Suite | Upscale Ybor Apt On.description:
This spacious second floor studio is located in the heart of Ybor City and features a shared balcony overlooking historic 7th Ave, ideal for those who are looking for a unique place to experience the area like a local! Immerse yourself in the culture by heading downstairs and exploring the plethora of restaurants, bars, and cigar shops native to the area.The SpaceThis centrally located studio loft features a queen bed, one bathroom, and a shared balcony overlooking historic Ybor City. Stocked with cooking supplies, fresh linens, and complimentary coffee this flat is designed with you in mind to make your vacation stress free!

Located on the second floor, this studio features stunning architecture including 10 foot ceilings and large windows to make the most of the Florida sunshine. The open concept kitchen features stainless steel appliances and a Keurig coffee machine for your stay. The full bathroom is complete with a bathtub and is stocked with complimentary toiletries! In the living area you'll find a cozy queen bed, comfortable living area and Smart TV for your enjoy all your favorite streaming services!

This property was constructed in 1908 and was known as the Buchman Department Store from 1914 to 1991. Although the building has since been converted into gorgeous studio-lofts and a hub for local businesses, you can still catch a glimpse of the old "Buchman Store" sign from 7th Avenue.Guest AccessGuests will receive a 6-digit access code that opens the door to the unit and an additional access code to enter the building.NeighborhoodFounded in the 1880s, the Historic Ybor City district is well known for its eclectic collection of culture and countless cigar factories in which the city was named, for Don Vincent Martinez Ybor. Take a stroll down the original red brick streets and step into a piece of history. Indulge in a comedy show at The Improv, dine at the historic Columbia Restaurant or explore the local shops, bars, and artisans that make the Ybor community so rich!Other things to note- Smoking: Smoking of any substance is strictly prohibited inside the unit and anywhere on the property. There will be a $500 fee charged to guests who do not obey this rule

- This studio apartment is located in the heart of Ybor, which is known for its fascinating history and vibrant nightlife so you will likely experience loud noise from time to time, especially during the weekend. If you would prefer to stay in a more toned-down area, please message us so we can point you in the right direction!

- Pets: this unit is pet friendly, pet fee is $15 per pet, per night.Getting AroundYbor City is notorious for the street trolley system- it's free, runs every 15 minutes and has many stops throughout Ybor, Downtown Tampa and Channelside! Ybor City is a very walkable neighborhood however, there are also self-service bicycles and electric scooters available for rent in the area via any of the scooter rental apps. (Bird, Uber, Lime, etc.)  If you are planning on exploring the Greater Tampa Bay Area, there are many car rental storefronts at the airport and in the surrounding area! Tampa and Ybor City have a plethora of street parking, garage parking and pay by app parking.

COMING SOON! The Humidor | 2 Stunning Yb.title: COMING SOON! The Humidor | 2 Stunning Ybor Townhomes
COMING SOON! The Humidor | 2 Stunning Yb.description:
The Humidor duo are newly constructed, tastefully designed townhomes in the heart of historic Ybor City! This complex can sleep up to 12 guests with three bedrooms as well as two and a half bathrooms in each home. Both houses were designed with your enjoyment in mind featuring ample living + entertaining spaces on the first & third floors. Soak up the sun on your private rooftop decks or curate a meal to share in the fully upgraded kitchens!The SpaceExperience the Casa Cohiba + Casa Monte Cristo duo when you book your next stay at the Humidor in Ybor City! These townhomes can sleep up to 12 guests with 6 bedrooms, 4 full bathrooms and 2 half bathrooms. 

The spacious first floor living areas each offer an HD flat-screen Smart TV equipped with Sonos surround sound that you can control from your phone. 

Just off each living room, you can utilize the pristine kitchen - truly a chef's dream. The kitchens feature top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances, Keurig coffee stations, gas stoves with wall-mounted pot fillers, and everything else from champagne glasses to pizza cutters!

Casa Cohiba features a Queen Bedroom, Twin Trundle Bedroom and Full Bathroom with a Bathtub on the first level. Casa Monte Cristo features two Queen Bedrooms and a Full Bathroom with a Bathtub on the first level. Both homes have a second floor lavish Master Bedroom with a plush King bed, expansive closet space, and an En-Suite bathroom. 

On the top floor of each Humidor Home, you’ll find a stylish lounge area with a flat-screen Smart TV, wet bar, and mini fridge - the perfect place to enjoy at-home entertainment with friends or to catch up on some much-needed R & R. Just off the 3rd-floor lounges are your own private sundecks, where you can take in amazing views of the downtown Tampa skyline and the surrounding neighborhood.Guest AccessGuests will receive a 6-digit access code that opens the rear entrance to both homes.NeighborhoodFounded in the 1880s, the Historic Ybor City district is well known for its eclectic collection of culture and countless cigar factories for which the city was named, for Don Vincent Martinez Ybor. Take a stroll down the original red brick streets and step into a piece of history. Indulge in a comedy show at The Improv, Eat at the historic Columbia Restaurant, or explore the local shops, bars, and artisans that make the Ybor community so rich.Other things to note- Door Locks: In each home, the front door facing E. 4th Avenue is locked and unlocked by lifting the handle UP and turning the lock simultaneously. 
- This is a non-smoking property. Smoking of any kind in the interior of the home will result in a $500 fine.
- Trash Info: Trash days are on Tuesday and Friday. Trash cans are located by the street in the front of the home.
- Pets: Pets are allowed, 50 lb maximum. $15 per day per pet - 2 pets maximum.
- Parking: This unit offers 2 private off-street parking spots in the rear of the home. There is also street parking in front of the home. You will need to send us your vehicle info upon booking this property for us to register your vehicle for free street parking.
- Private washer/dryer in each home
- We do not allow smoking inside this property. All reservations are subject to being charged a smoking fee if you or your guests choose to smoke inside.Getting AroundYbor is a very walkable neighborhood however, there are also self-service bicycles and electric scooters available for rent in the area via any of the scooter rental apps. (Bird, Uber, Lime, etc.)  If you are planning on exploring the Tampa Bay Area, there are many car rental storefronts at the airport and in the surrounding area! Tampa has a plethora of street parking, garage parking, and pay-by-app parking.

NEW! Kingston Cabana | Gorgeous Condo N.title: NEW! Kingston Cabana |  Gorgeous Condo Near Lido Beach
NEW! Kingston Cabana | Gorgeous Condo N.description:
Experience coastal bliss & all the luxuries beach life has to offer when you stay in our ground floor Kingston Cabana! This one bed, one bath flat features a brand new stainless steel kitchen and a gorgeous view of the shared pool in the courtyard. Our home puts you in the center of all Sarasota has to offer - a 10 minute walk from Lido Key Beach, 5 minute walk to the famous St. Armands Circle and a 10 minute drive to downtown Sarasota waterfront!The SpaceThis first floor flat is perfect for up to four guests with one king bedroom, one queen sleeper sofa and one full bathroom! The private screened in patio features a stunning view of the shared community pool and lush courtyard landscape. 

The Kingston Cabana was recently renovated with you in mind! The fully upgraded kitchen features brand new appliances, cooking utensils for your stay and a stocked Keurig Coffee Machine. The open concept living + dining area is complete with a brand new queen sized sleeper sofa and a smart TV! 

The king bedroom is equipped with motorized shades, a brand new mattress and desk perfect for those who need to work from home! Just outside the bedroom you'll find the full bathroom featuring a bathtub and complimentary toiletries. The home is stocked with fresh bath towels, pool towels and linens to make your trip a breeze!Guest AccessGuests will receive a 6-digit access code that opens the door to unit.NeighborhoodSt. Armands is a lively, historic beachside town famous for the "circle" roundabout lined with shopping, dining and local flair! This historic circle is adorned with various statues + plates highlighting the culture of the St.Armands area and features seasonal events for locals and tourists alike! Some of our favorite spots in the circle include the Columbia Restaurant, Crisp Waffle Company and Shore. This flat is also walking distance to the gorgeous Lido Key Beach known for its white sand and glistening waters!Other things to note- This is a non-smoking property. Smoking of any kind in the interior of the home will result in a $500 fine.
- Trash Info: Trash and Recycle cans are located outside the unit, next to parking spot 30.
- Pets: One pet is allowed per stay, 50 lb maximum. The pet fee is $15 per day.
- Laundry: There is a shared laundry room on-site that requires quarters to wash/dry. There are complimentary laundry pods + dryer sheets in the unit for your stay.Getting AroundSt. Armands is a very pedestrian friendly area and you'll find it is very easy to get around! To get around the area we recommend walking, biking or taking advantage of the Bay Runner Trolley that runs from Lido Key to downtown Sarasota. There is also a plethora of street and beach parking available in addition to your private off street parking spot if you do decide to bring a vehicle with you.

1BR/2BA Condo- Ocean View at Beachside.title: 1BR/2BA Condo- Ocean View at Beachside
1BR/2BA Condo- Ocean View at Beachside.description:
Set on seven acres of property overlooking the Gulf of Mexico, experience luxury at Beachside Resort & Residences. Unwind in the perfect blend of adventure and relaxation in sunny Key West.

On property, you can find access to our resort pool, ocean marina, and the ability to book a sandbar or sunset cruise.

Don’t miss out on fine dining at our award winning restaurant, Tavern N Town, or grab a delectable meal poolside at Chicken Walk.The SpaceStart each morning overlooking the Gulf of Mexico from your private balcony of this 1-bedroom condo, complete with a full kitchen, washer/dryer, and 2 full bathrooms
Our one-bedroom, two-bathroom condo provides everything you need for your next getaway to Beachside Key West.
Sleeping arrangements include:
Bedroom 1: King bed and en-suite bathroom with a double vanity and whirlpool tub
Living Area: Queen sleeper sofa

The fully-equipped kitchen features stainless-steel appliances and includes all cooking essentials. With its open-concept floor plan, the indoor living area seamlessly connects to the private balcony, creating the perfect space for quality time.Guest AccessPersonalized check in experience!
Our luxury resort offers a 24-hour heated pool, hot tub, on-site marina, restaurant and waterview fitness center.
Guests have access to a local Guest Experience Manager (GEM) for recommendations such as on-site bike rentals, water excursions, and our favorite places to eat.NeighborhoodConveniently located on north Key West, Beachside Resort sits on an ideal seven acres of land situated just 10 minutes from Duval Street, ensuring you can be as close or as far from the ‘happenings’ as you’d like. Our hotel contains over 200 guest rooms and suites, two on-property restaurants, a 46,000 gallon pool and Key West’s largest ballroom.Other things to note- Host your wedding, corporate, or social events in one of Key West's largest ballrooms with full in-house catering services available.
- This property is not pet-friendly.
- Private stackable washer/dryer.Getting AroundParking Information:
Garage parking available on property for $25/night; with electric charging stations.

On-site Shuttle & Rentals:
We provide a daily shuttle from 8am to 11pm for easy access to Key West and its famed Duval Street attractions or check out our on-site bike & watercraft rentals at Brightwild Adventures.

Our luxury resort offers a 24-hour heated pool, hot tub, on-site marina, restaurant and waterview fitness center.
Guests have access to a local Guest Experience Manager (GEM) for recommendations such as on-site bike rentals, water excursions, and our favorite places to eat.NeighborhoodConveniently located on north Key West, Beachside Resort sits on an ideal seven acres of land situated just 10 minutes from Duval Street, ensuring you can be as close or as far from the ‘happenings’ as you’d like. Our hotel contains over 200 guest rooms and suites, two on-property restaurants, a 46,000 gallon pool and Key West’s largest ballroom.Other things to note- Host your wedding, corporate, or social events in one of Key West's largest ballrooms with full in-house catering services available.
- This property is not pet-friendly.
- Private stackable washer/dryer.Getting AroundParking Information:
Garage parking available on property for $25/night; with electric charging stations.

On-site Shuttle & Rentals:
We provide a daily shuttle from 8am to 11pm for easy access to Key West and its famed Duval Street attractions or check out our on-site bike & watercraft rentals at Brightwild Adventures.

Condo w/ Direct Pool Access, Sleeps 8 at.title: Condo w/ Direct Pool Access, Sleeps 8 at Beachside
Condo w/ Direct Pool Access, Sleeps 8 at.description:
Set on seven acres of property overlooking the Gulf of Mexico, experience luxury at Beachside Resort & Residences. Unwind in the perfect blend of adventure and relaxation in sunny Key West.

On property, you can find access to our resort pool, ocean marina, and the ability to book a sandbar or sunset cruise.

Don’t miss out on fine dining at our award winning restaurant, Tavern N Town, or grab a delectable meal poolside at Chicken Walk.The SpaceThis two-bedroom condo accommodates up to 8 guests! Situated on the first floor, it features a private balcony and staircase leading to the pool area, offering everything you need for your next Beachside Key West getaway.

Sleeping arrangements include:
Bedroom 1: King bed and en-suite bathroom with a double vanity and whirlpool tub
Bedroom 2: Two double beds with en-suite bathroom (separated via lock out door)
Living Area: Queen sleeper sofa

The fully-equipped kitchen features stainless-steel appliances and includes all cooking essentials. With its open-concept floor plan, the indoor living area seamlessly connects to the private balcony, creating the perfect space for quality time.Guest AccessPersonalized check in experience!
Our luxury resort offers a 24-hour heated pool, hot tub, on-site marina, restaurant and waterview fitness center.
Guests have access to a local Guest Experience Manager (GEM) for recommendations such as on-site bike rentals, water excursions, and our favorite places to eat.NeighborhoodConveniently located on north Key West, Beachside Resort sits on an ideal seven acres of land situated just 10 minutes from Duval Street, ensuring you can be as close or as far from the ‘happenings’ as you’d like. Our hotel contains over 200 guest rooms and suites, two on-property restaurants, a 46,000 gallon pool and Key West’s largest ballroom.Other things to note- Host your wedding, corporate, or social events in one of Key West's largest ballrooms with full in-house catering services available.

NEW! Atlantic Escape by Brightwild - Bea.title: NEW! Atlantic Escape by Brightwild - Beach & Pool
NEW! Atlantic Escape by Brightwild - Bea.description:
Atlantic Escape is a freshly renovated two bedroom two bath condo, perfectly placed in the upscale 1800 Atlantic oceanfront community with the beach just steps away & Duval Street walking distance from your front door. 

This condo includes a private balcony and shared pool, hot tub, library, grill & sauna access. You'll also be able to park your car in a garage, strengthen your backhand on the tennis courts, and come away from your vacation even stronger with access to the fitness center!The SpaceLooking to work-from-home for a month in the Keys? Or are you wanting to take some much needed R&R on a month-long getaway?

Atlantic escape is perfect for a family of four or two couples. 
Bedroom 1 - Master bedroom with king bed, balcony access, make-up vanity, double closets & walk-in shower. 
Bedroom 2 - Spacious queen bedroom with TV, balcony access & hall bathroom access
Modern open-concept living area with ample countertop space, cabinet storage, a wine fridge, bar & stainless steel appliances.Guest AccessGuests will receive a personalized access code prior to arrival and direct contact to a local guest experience manager for any questions, needs or recommendations during their stay.NeighborhoodThis condo sits on a quiet residential street in a quiet area of Key West known as "Mid-Town" and is located just a few blocks from popular Higgs Beach, Salute Beach Bar, volleyball and pickle ball courts!  You are just a 5 minute drive or 10 minute bike ride from Duval St and Key West's local attractions- including bike paths, nightlife restaurants, and shopping.
Ask your GEM for their favorite things-to-do and places-to-go!Other things to note- Private washer and dryer located inside the condo. To get you started we supply detergent and dryer sheets.
- 28-night minimum
- This property is not pet friendly
- 25+ to rentGetting AroundThis unit includes garage parking for 1 vehicle.

There are a variety of great ways to explore Key West including by bicycle, pedi-cab, moke, scooter, golf cart, Uber, Taxi, or by feet. Feel free to ask us for recommendations!

Awai's Floating Villa - Luxury Houseboat.title: Awai's Floating Villa - Luxury Houseboat
Awai's Floating Villa - Luxury Houseboat.description:
Experience Key West in a new way: aboard a luxury houseboat!
From watching sunrise on the dock to watching sunset from the rooftop, or enjoying one of the best happy hours in town, you won't even need to leave the Marina. Come aboard & see why life really is better on a boat.The SpaceEmbark on a unique getaway on our expansive houseboat, an aquatic haven that comfortably accommodates up to four guests.
 Immerse yourself in the luxury of the master suite, complete with a queen-sized bed, private bath, and sliding glass doors that open up to breathtaking waterfront vistas from the back deck. Accompanying another couple? Our second bedroom won't disappoint, boasting a queen-sized bed and direct access to a spacious bathroom. 
Relax in the open living area or breathe in the salty air on one of the three deck areas. The fully stocked kitchen awaits your home cooked meals or venture out to the nearby Perry Marina restaurants for a delectable dining experience.Guest AccessOur contactless check-in procedure makes check-in easy. Guests will receive a code for the lock box to retrieve the key prior to arrival.

Shared Features: This unique stay is located at the beautiful Perry Marina, where you have access to amenities including a pool, restaurants and barsNeighborhoodThis property is located at the Perry Marina in Stock Island - the authentic and revitalized fishing and arts community located directly east of downtown Key West.Other things to note- The property is a houseboat docked at the Perry Marina. 
- It includes full service power and water. 
- Other amenities include: Keurig coffee maker, private stackable washer/dryer, rooftop, steering wheel is for show (not use), first come first serve parking, and access to Perry Marina amenities.Getting AroundArrive by boat, plane, or car. On-site golf cart rentals are available; or take advantage of the many taxi and ride-sharing services available for short trips around Key West and Stock Island.

Haven House by Brightwild - Luxury, Wate.title: Haven House by Brightwild - Luxury, Waterfront
Haven House by Brightwild - Luxury, Wate.description:
The Haven House is truly heavenly on the quiet residential canals in Key Haven. This home boasts a modern waterfront private backyard with a dock and boat lift. With space-maximizing and luxury island touches from top to bottom, this monthly rental has it all. Stay 15 minutes from downtown Duval Street in this one-of-a-kind island home.The SpaceSeamless indoor-outdoor entertainment is made easy with the open-concept floor plan and inviting features at the Haven House. With an indoor tiki bar, sectional couch and bay doors that lead to the back deck the home is flooded with natural light for a true Florida Keys feel This 3-bedroom bungalow includes 1 King bed & 2 Queens. It also includes three full bathrooms.Guest AccessGuests will receive a personalized access code prior to arrival and direct contact to a local guest experience manager for any questions, needs or recommendations during their stay.

Boating & Private Dock Slip:
We encourage boating. Here's what you need to know in order to do so safely:
- This waterfront lot offers docking up to 25'
- There is no power or pump out service to the slips.
- The Florida Keys are a notoriously difficult place to navigate.NeighborhoodLocated less than one mile from Key West and all of its famous attractions in a family-style neighborhood. 

Key Haven To-Dos:
There is a local park walking distance from the unit to spend time with your family and friends. 
Rent a boat for the day out of Stock Rock Café at Cow Key Marina and embrace island time!
Catch a kayak tour out of Lazy Dog in Stock Island.

Our Favorite Nearby Restaurant Recommendations:
Locals’ favorites Hogfish Grill, Roostica or Chicos Cantina. Take a trip to Hurricane Hole for happy hour or head downtown for some of the best seafood.

Ask your GEM for their favorite things-to-do and places-to-go!Other things to note- Private washer/dryer
- 28-night minimumGetting AroundTravel by car, boat, or plane to our luxury estate. The driveway allows parking for up to 2 vehicles.
If you didn’t travel by water, you can also drop your boat at one of the public boat ramps in Key Haven or Stock Island. 
Rent a golf cart, scooter, moke or bike for the day to explore the area. Feel free to ask us for recommendations!
